USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

2 G‹Korinthios›G

1  G‹Paulos›G, an_ambassador of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G by the_will of_god, and G‹Timotheos›G the brother, to_the assembly of_god being in Rx-G‹Korinthos›G-Rx, with the holy ones all being in all G‹Aⱪaia›G: 2 grace to_you_all and peace, from god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   3 Blessed is the god and father of_the master of_us G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, the father of_compassions and god of_all comfort, 4 the one comforting us in all the tribulation of_us, in_order that to_be_able us to_be_comforting the ones in every tribulation, through the comfort with_which we_are_being_comforted ourselves by god.
   5 Because as is_abounding the sufferings of_the chosen_one toward us, thus through the chosen_one is_abounding also the comfort of_us.
   6 But whether we_are_being_oppressed, for the of_you_all comfort and salvation it_is, or we_are_being_comforted, for the of_you_all comfort it_is, working in the_endurance of_the same sufferings, which also we are_suffering.
   7 And the hope of_us confirmed for you_all, having_known that as partners you_all_are of_the sufferings, thus also of_the comfort.
   8 For not we_are_wanting you_all to_be_not_knowing, brothers, about the tribulation of_us having_become in G‹Asia›G, that against excess beyond our_power we_were_weighed_down, so_as to_be_despairing us even to_be_living.
   9 But ourselves in ourselves the sentence of_death we_have_had, in_order_that not having_trusted we_may_be_may_be in ourselves, but in god, the one raising the dead, 10 who from so_great a_death rescued us, and will_be_rescuing us, in whom we_have_hoped also still he_will_be_rescuing us, 11 cooperating_with also you_all for us in_petition, in_order_that by many people, the toward us gift, through many, may_be_given_thanks for us.
   12 For the boasting of_us this is: the testimony of_the conscience of_us, that in holiness and sincerity of_god, and not in wisdom fleshly, but in grace of_god, we_were_conducted in the world, and more_abundantly toward you_all.
   13 For no other things we_are_writing to_you_all, but than what you_all_are_reading or even you_all_are_understanding, and I_am_hoping that to the_end you_all_will_be_understanding, 14 as also you_all_understood us in part, that the_boast of_you_all we_are, just_as also you_all are of_us, in the day of_the master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G.
   15 And with_this confidence I_was_wishing previously, to you_all to_come, in_order_that a_second grace you_all_may_have, 16 and by you_all to_pass_through to G‹Makedonia›G, and again from G‹Makedonia›G to_come to you_all, and by you_all to_be_sent_forward to Rx-G‹Youdaia›G-Rx.
   17 Therefore this wishing, surely_not consequently to_lightness I_resorted.
   Or what I_am_counselling, according_to flesh I_am_counselling, in_order_that may_be with me Yes, yes, and No, no.
   18 But faithful god is, that the word of_us to you_all, not is Yes and No.
   19 The For of_god son, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, who among you_all by us having_been_proclaimed, by me, and G‹Silouanos›G, and G‹Timotheos›G, not became Yes and No, but Yes in him has_become.
   20 For as_many_as promises of_god, in him is the Yes.
   Therefore also through him, the Truly, to_god for the_glory by us.
   21 And the one confirming us with you_all to chosen_one and having_anointed us is god, 22 who also having_sealed us and having_given the deposit of_the spirit in the hearts of_us.
   23 But I as_witness god am_calling on my soul that sparing from_you_all no_longer I_came to Rx-G‹Korinthos›G-Rx.
   24 Not that we_are_mastering of_you_all over_the faith, but fellow-workers we_are of_the joy with_you_all, for in_the faith you_all_have_stood.
  Co-2 2  I_judged for by_myself this, not again in sorrow to you_all to_come.
   2 For if I am_sorrowing you_all, also who is gladdening me, except the one being_sorrowed by me.
   3 And I_wrote this same thing, in_order_that not having_come, sorrow I_may_have from of_whom it_was_fitting me to_be_rejoicing, having_trusted in all you_all that my joy of_all of_you_all is.
   4 For out_of much tribulation and anguish of_heart, I_wrote to_you_all through many tears, not in_order_that you_all_may_be_sorrowed, but the love in_order_that you_all_may_know that I_am_having more_abundantly toward you_all.
   5 But if anyone has_sorrowed, not me he_has_sorrowed, but in part, in_order_that not I_may_be_burdening all you_all.
   6 Worthy is to_such one punishment this, which is by the more, 7 so_that instead rather you_all are to_forgive and to_comfort him, lest somehow with_the more_abundant sorrow, may_be_swallowed_up such one.
   8 Therefore I_am_exhorting you_all, to_confirm toward him love.
   9 For for this also I_wrote, in_order_that I_may_know the provenness of_you_all, whether to all things obedient you_all_are.
   10 But to_whomever anything you_all_are_forgiving, also_I forgive, for also I what have_forgiven, if anything I_have_forgiven, because_of you_all it_is in the_presence of_chosen_one, 11 in_order_that not we_may_be_exploited by G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G, for not of_him the thinking we_are_not_knowing.
   12 And having_come to Rx-G‹Trōias›G-Rx for the gospel of_the chosen_one/messiah, and a_door to_me having_been_opened_up in the_master, 13 not I_have_had relaxation in_the spirit of_me, not to_find me G‹Titos›G the brother of_me, but having_bid_goodbye to_them, I_came_out to G‹Makedonia›G.
   14 But to_god thankfulness be, to_the one always triumphing us in the chosen_one, and the aroma of_the knowledge of_him, revealing through us in every place.
   15 Because of_chosen_one a_sweet_fragrance we_are to_god, in the ones being_saved and in the ones perishing, 16 to_one one_one_hand an_aroma from death to death, on_the_other_hand to_one an_aroma from life to life.
   And for these things who is worthy.
   17 For not we_are like the many peddling the word of_god, but as of sincerity, but as of god, in_front_of god in chosen_one we_are_speaking.
  Co-2 3  We_are_beginning again ourselves commending.
   Or not we_are_needing, as some, of_commendatory letters to you_all or from you_all.
   2 The letter of_us you_all are, having_been_inscribed in the hearts of_us, being_known and being_read by all people, 3 being_revealed that you_all_are a_letter of_chosen_one, having_been_served by us, and having_been_inscribed not in_ink, but with_the_spirit of_god the_living, not on tablets stone, but on tablets of_hearts fleshy.
   4 And confidence such we_are_having through the chosen_one toward god.
   5 Not that from ourselves worthy we_are to_reckon anything as of ourselves, but the qualified of_us is of god, 6 who also qualified us as_servants of_a_new covenant, not of_the_letter, but of_the_spirit, for the letter will_be_killing_off, but the spirit is_giving_life.
   7 But if the service of_death in letters having_been_engraved in_stones was_become in glory, so_as not to_be_able to_look_intently the sons of_Rx-G‹H‹Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G-Rx at the face of_G‹H‹Mōsēs/(Mosheh)›H›G, because_of the glory of_the face of_him, which is being_nullified, 8 how not more the service of_the spirit will_be in glory.
   9 For if in_the the_service was of_condemnation, glory by_much more is_abounding the service of_righteousness in_glory.
   10 For even not has_been_glorified, the thing having_been_glorified in this regard on_account the surpassing glory.
   11 For if the thing being_wasted through glory was, by_much rather the thing remaining in glory.
   12 Therefore having such hope to_great boldness we_are_resorting, 13 and not just_as G‹H‹Mōsēs was_putting a_veil over the face of_him, for that not to_look_intently the sons of_Rx-G‹H‹Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G-Rx, to the end of_the thing being_wasted.
   14 But was_hardened the thinking of_them.
   For until the today day, the same veil at at_the public_reading of_the old covenant is_remaining, not being_unveiled that in chosen_one/messiah it_is_being_nullified.
   15 But to today whenever may_be_being_read G‹H‹Mōsēs, a_veil from the heart of_them is_lying.
   16 But whenever it_may_turn_back to the_master, is_being_taken_away the veil.
   17 And the master the spirit is, and where the spirit of_the_master is, freedom is.
   18 But we all having_been_unveiled in_face, the glory of_the_master reflecting, in_the same image we_are_being_transformed, from glory to glory, just_as from of_the_master, the_spirit.
  Co-2 4  Because_of this having service this, as we_were_shown_mercy, not we_are_losing_heart.
   2 But we_renounced the hidden things of_shame, neither walking in craftiness, nor falsifying the word of_god, but by_manifestation of_the truth, commending ourselves to every conscience of_people before god.
   3 But if also is having_been_concealed the gospel of_us, in the ones perishing it_is having_been_concealed, 4 in whom the god of_age this blinded the thinking of_the unbelievers, in_order that not to_radiate the enlightenment of_the gospel of_the glory of_the chosen_one, who is the_image of_god.
   5 For not ourselves we_are_proclaiming, but G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one the_master, and ourselves slaves of_you_all because_of G‹H‹Yēsous.
   6 Because god having_said: out_of darkness light will_be_shining, who shined in the hearts of_us, for enlightenment of_the knowledge of_the glory of_god in the_face of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   7 But we_are_having treasure this in earthen vessels, in_order_that the excellent of_the power may_be of_god, and not from us, 8 in every way being_oppressed, but not being_crushed, perplexing, but not despairing, 9 being_persecuted, but not being_abandoned, being_struck_down, but not perishing, 10 always the death of_G‹H‹Yēsous in our body carrying_about, in_order_that also the life of_G‹H‹Yēsous in the body of_us may_be_revealed.
   11 For always we, the ones living, to death are_being_given_over because_of G‹H‹Yēsous, in_order_that also the life of_the of_G‹H‹Yēsous may_be_revealed in the mortal flesh of_us.
   12 So_then death in us is_working, but life in you_all.
   13 But having the same spirit of_faith, according_to the word having_been_written: I_believed, therefore I_spoke, also we are_believing, therefore also we_are_speaking, 14 having_known that the one having_raised G‹H‹Yēsous, also us with G‹H‹Yēsous will_be_raising, and will_be_presenting us with you_all.
   15 For the things all are because_of you_all, in_order_that the grace having_abounded through more, the thanksgiving may_abound to the glory of_god.
   16 Therefore not we_are_losing_heart, but if also the outside of_us person is_being_ruined, but the person inside of_us is_being_renewed by_day and day.
   17 For the momentary light of_tribulation as excess to excess an_eternal burden of_glory, is_producing for_us, 18 not observing of_us the things being_seen, but the things not being_seen, for the things being_seen are temporary, but the things not being_seen are eternal.
  Co-2 5  For we_have_known that if the earthly of_us house of_the tent may_be_torn_down, a_building from god we_are_having, a_house not_hand_made eternal in the heavens.
   2 For also in this we_are_groaning, the dwelling of_us which is from heaven to_be_clothed longing.
   3 if_indeed also having_dressed_in, not naked we_will_be_being_found.
   4 For also being in the tent, we_are_groaning, being_weighed_down in that not we_are_wanting to_strip_off, but to_be_clothed, in_order_that may_be_swallowed_up the mortal by life.
   5 And the one having_prepared us for same purpose this god is, the one having_given to_us the deposit of_the spirit.
   6 Therefore having_confidence always, and having_known that being_at_home in the body, we_are_being_absent from the master, 7 by for faith we_are_walking, not by appearance.
   8 And we_are_having_confidence and we_are_taking_pleasure rather to_be_absent out_of the body and to_be_at_home with the master.
   9 Therefore also we_are_being_ambitious, whether being_at_home or being_absent, well_pleasing to_him to_be.
   10 For all us to_be_revealed it_is_fitting, before the tribunal of_the chosen_one/messiah, in_order_that may_receive_back each the things through the body, with what he_did, whether good or evil.
   11 Therefore having_known the fear of_the master, people we_are_persuading, But to_god we_have_been_revealed, and I_am_hoping also in the consciences of_you_all to_have_revealed.
   12 Not again ourselves we_are_commending to_you_all, but opportunity giving to_you_all of_boast for you_all, in_order_that you_all_may_be_having toward the ones in appearance boasting, and not in the_heart.
   13 For whether we_flipped_out, to_god it_is, or we_are_being_sensible, for_you_all it_is.
   14 For the love of_the chosen_one is_holding us, having_judged this, that one for all died_off, consequently all died_off.
   15 And for all he_died_off, in_order_that the ones living, no_longer to_themselves may_be_living, but to_the one for them having_died_off and having_been_raised.
   16 So_then we from the time now no_one have_known according_to flesh.
   If even we_have_known according_to flesh chosen_one, but now no_longer we_are_knowing him.
   17 So_then if anyone is in chosen_one, a_new creation he_is, the ancient things passed_away, see, it_has_become new.
   18 And the things all of god, the one having_reconciled us to_himself by chosen_one, and having_given to_us the service of_reconciliation, 19 how that god was in chosen_one the_world reconciling to_himself, not reckoning to_them the transgressions of_them, and having_put in us the word of_reconciliation.
   20 For Therefore chosen_one we_are_being_ambassadors, as_though god exhorting through us, we_are_beseeching for chosen_one, be_reconciled to_god.
   21 The one not having_known sin, for us sin he_made, in_order_that we may_become the_righteousness of_god in him.
  Co-2 6  And working_together also, we_are_exhorting not in vain the grace of_god to_receive you_all.
   2 For he_is_saying: in_a_time acceptable I_listened_to from_you, and in the_day of_salvation I_gave_help to_you.
   See now is the_time acceptable, see, now is the_day of_salvation.
   3 Not_one in nothing giving cause_for_stumbling, in_order_that not may_be_blemished the service.
   4 But in everything commending ourselves as of_god servants: in endurance great, in tribulations, in distresses, in distresses, 5 in beatings, in prisons, in disturbances, in labors, in watchings, in fastings, 6 in purity, in knowledge, in patience, in kindness, in the_spirit holy, in love unhypocritical, 7 in the_word of_truth, in the_power of_god, through the weapons of_righteousness of_the right hand and the_left, 8 through glory and dishonor, through defamation and good_report, as deceivers and_yet true, 9 as being_not_knowing and_yet being_known_fully, as dying_off and_yet see, we_are_living, as being_disciplined and_yet not being_put_to_death, 10 as being_sorrowed but always rejoicing, as poor but many making_rich, as nothing having and_yet all things keeping.
   11 The mouth of_us has_opened_up to you_all, G‹Korinthios›G, the heart of_you_all has_been_widened.
   12 Not you_all_are_being_restricted by us, but you_all_are_being_restricted in the compassions of_you_all.
   13 And for_the the_same recompense (as to_children I_am_speaking) be_widened also you_all.
   14 Not be_becoming mispairing with_unbelievers, for what partnership exists by_righteousness and lawlessness, or what fellowship exists by_light with darkness.
   15 And what harmony is of_chosen_one/messiah with G‹Beliar›G, or what portion exists by_a_believer with an_unbeliever.
   16 And what agreement exists by_the_temple of_god with idols.
   for we the_temple of_god are the_living, as said god, I_will_be_dwelling in them, and I_will_be_walking_among them, and I_will_be of_them god, and they will_be of_me a_people.
   17 Therefore come_out from the_midst of_them and be_set_apart, is_saying the_master: and against_the_unclean not be_touching, and_I will_be_receiving_in you_all.
   18 And I_will_be to_you_all for a_father, and you_all will_be to_me for sons and daughters, is_saying the_master almighty.
  Co-2 7  Therefore these having the promises, beloved, we_may_cleanse ourselves from every defilement of_flesh and spirit, accomplishing holiness in the_reverence of_god.
   2 Have_room for_us, no_one we_did_wrong, no_one we_corrupted, no_one we_exploited.
   3 For condemnation not I_am_speaking, for I_have_previously_said that you_all_are, in the hearts of_us in_order that to_die_together and to_be_living_together.
   4 Great is to_me boldness toward you_all, great is to_me boasting for you_all, I_have_been_filled with_exhortation, I_am_being_overflowed with_joy in all the tribulation of_us.
   5 For also having_come of_us into G‹Makedonia›G, not_one had relaxation the flesh of_us, but in every way being_oppressed, outside quarrels, inside fears.
   6 But the one comforting the humble, comforted us god by the coming of_G‹Titos›G, 7 not and only by the coming of_him, but also by the comfort with_which he_was_comforted in you_all, declaring to_us the of_you_all longing, the of_you_all mourning, the of_you_all zeal for me, so_as for_me more to_be_elated.
   8 Because if also I_sorrowed you_all in the letter, not I_am_regretting it.
   if even I_was_regretting it (I_am_seeing that letter that, if even for an_hour sorrowed you_all) 9 now I_am_rejoicing not that you_all_were_sorrowed, but that you_all_were_sorrowed into repentance, for you_all_were_sorrowed according_to god, in_order_that in nothing you_all_may_be_lost by us.
   10 For the according_to god sorrow, repentance to salvation unregrettable is_producing, and the of_the world sorrow, death is_producing.
   11 For see same thing this according_to god to_be_sorrowed, how_much it_produced in_you_all earnestness: but what defense, but what resentment, but what fear, but what longing, but what zeal, but what vengeance.
   In everything you_all_demonstrated yourselves pure to_be in_the matter.
   12 Consequently if also I_wrote to_you_all, not on_account the one having_done_wrong, nor on_account the one having_been_done_wrong, but on_account the thing to_be_revealed the earnestness of_you_all, which is for us to you_all before god.
   13 Because_of this we_have_been_comforted.
   And to the comfort of_us, more_abundantly rather we_were_elated at the joy of_G‹Titos›G, because has_been_refreshed the spirit of_him by all of_you_all.
   14 Because if anything to_him about you_all I_have_boasted, not I_was_disgraced, but as all things in truth we_spoke to_you_all, thus also the boasting of_us to G‹Titos›G truth was_become.
   15 And the compassions of_him more_abundantly toward you_all is, being_reminded the of_all of_you_all obedience, how with fear and trembling you_all_received him.
   16 I_am_rejoicing that in everything, I_am_having_confidence in you_all.
  Co-2 8  And we_are_making_known to_you_all, brothers, the grace of_god having_been_given among the assemblies of_G‹Makedonia›G, 2 that in much provenness of_tribulation, the abundance of_the joy of_them and according_to depth poverty of_them, abounded into the riches of_the generosity of_them.
   3 Because according_to their_ability I_am_testifying, and beside their_ability, voluntary 4 with much exhortation beseeching of_us, the grace and the fellowship of_the service among the holy ones.
   5 And not as we_hoped, but themselves they_gave, first to_the master, and to_us, by the_will of_god.
   6 In_order that to_exhort us G‹Titos›G, in_order_that as he_previously_began, thus also he_may_accomplish in you_all also grace this.
   7 But as in every thing you_all_are_abounding, in_faith, and speech, and knowledge, and all earnestness, and the from us to you_all love, in_order_that also in this grace you_all_may_be_abounding.
   8 Not as a_command I_am_speaking, but through the of_others earnestness, also the of_your love genuine approving.
   9 For you_all_are_knowing the grace of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, that because_of you_all he_became_poor, rich being, in_order_that you_all by_the of_that one poverty may_be_rich.
   10 And a_opinion in this I_am_giving, for this for_you_all is_benefitting, who not only to_do, but also to_be_willing, previously_began from last_year.
   11 But now also to_do accomplish you, so_that just_as the readiness of_the one to_be_willing, thus also that to_accomplish out_of that to_be_having.
   12 For if the readiness is_lying_before, as he_may_be_having acceptable it_is, not as not he_is_having.
   13 For not in_order_that to_others relaxation may_be, to_you_all tribulation, but of equality.
   14 At the present time, the of_you_all excess is for the one of_those need, in_order_that also the of_those excess may_become for the of_you_all need, so_that there_may_become equality.
   15 As it_has_been_written: the one with_the much, not abounded, and the one with_the little, no had_less.
   16 But thankfulness be to_god, the one giving the same earnestness for you_all in the heart of_G‹Titos›G.
   17 Because our indeed appeal he_received, but more_earnest being voluntary, he_came_out to you_all.
   18 And we_sent_with with him the brother, of_whose praise is in the gospel through all of_the assemblies, 19 not and only this, but also having_been_chosen by the assemblies are_travelling_companion of_us, with grace this being_served by us, for the of_the master glory, and the_readiness of_us, 20 avoiding this, lest anyone us may_blemish, in exuberance this being_served by us, 21 for we_are_providing good, not only before the_master, but also before people.
   22 And we_sent_with with_them the brother of_us, whom we_approved in many things, often earnest being, but now much more_earnestly by_his_confidence much toward you_all.
   23 Whether concerning G‹Titos›G, ˱he_is˲_partner my and for you_all a_fellow-worker, or the_brothers of_us, ambassadors of_the_assemblies the_glory of_chosen_one.
   24 Therefore the sign of_the love of_you_all, and of_us boasting about you_all, to them displaying in face of_the assemblies.
  Co-2 9  Concerning for indeed the service to the holy ones, superfluous for_me is to_be_writing to_you_all.
   2 For I_have_known the readiness of_you_all, which concerning you_all I_am_boasting to_the_G‹ones_from_Makedonia›G, that G‹Aⱪaia›G has_prepared from last_year, and the of_you_all zeal provoked more of_them.
   3 But I_sent the brothers, in_order_that not the boast of_us, which is about you_all, may_be_voided in regard this, in_order_that as I_was_saying, having_prepared you_all_may_be.
   4 Not somehow if may_come with me G‹ones_from_Makedonia›G, and they_may_find you_all unprepared, may_be_disgraced we, in_order_that not we_may_be_saying you_all, by confidence this.
   5 Therefore necessary I_considered it to_exhort the brothers, in_order_that they_may_go_ahead to you_all and they_may_prearrange the having_previously_promised blessing of_you_all, this ready to_be thus as a_blessing, and not as greediness.
   6 And this: the one sowing sparingly, sparingly also will_be_reaping, and the one sowing on blessings, on blessings also will_be_reaping.
   7 ˱Let˲_each do as he_has_chosen in_his heart, not out_of sorrow or of necessity, for a_cheerful giver is_loving god.
   8 And is_able god all grace to_abound to you_all, in_order_that in every way always all contentment having, you_all_may_be_abounding in every work good.
   9 As it_has_been_written: he_scattered, he_gave to_the poor, the righteousness of_him is_remaining to the age.
   10 And the one supplying seed to_the one sowing, and bread for food, will_be_supplying and will_be_multiplying the seed of_you_all, and will_be_growing the fruits of_the righteousness of_you_all, 11 in every way being_made_rich to all generosity, which is_producing through us, thanksgiving to_god.
   12 Because the service of_ministry this, not only is replenishing the needs of_the holy ones, but also abounding through many thanksgivings to_god, 13 through the provenness of_service this, glorifying god at the submission of_the of_confession of_you_all to the gospel of_the chosen_one/messiah, and on_the_generosity of_the fellowship toward them and toward all, 14 and of_them with_the_petition for you_all, longing_for for_you_all, because_of the surpassing grace of_god on you_all.
   15 Thankfulness be to_god for the indescribable of_him gift.
   Co-2 10  And myself I, G‹Paulos›G, am_exhorting you_all by the gentleness and gentleness of_the chosen_one, who concerning appearance indeed am_humble among you_all, but being_absent I_am_having_confidence toward you_all.
   2 And I_am_beseeching you that not, being_present to_have_confidence with_the confidence with_which I_am_reckoning, to_dare to some reckoning us, as according_to the_flesh walking.
   3 In for the_flesh walking, not according_to flesh we_are_warring.
   4 For the weapons of_the army of_us are not fleshly, but powerful to_god to the_tearing_down of_strongholds, arguments taking_down, 5 and every height lifted_up against the knowledge of_god, and making_captive every thinking into the obedience of_the chosen_one, 6 and in ready having to_avenge all disobedience, whenever may_be_fulfilled of_you_all the obedience.
   7 ˱At˲_the things according_to appearance you_all_are_looking.
   If anyone has_persuaded by_himself of_chosen_one to_be, this him _let_be_reckoning again by himself, that as he is of_chosen_one, thus also we are.
   8 For if more_abundantly something I_may_boast concerning the authority of_us, which gave the master for building you and not for tearing_down of_you_all, not I_will_be_being_ashamed, 9 in_order_that not I_may_suppose as_though to_be_terrifying you_all by my letters.
   10 Because: His letters indeed, they_are_saying: heavy and strong are, but the presence of_his body is weak, and his speech having_been_scorned.
   11 This let_be_reckoning such one, that such_as we_are in_word by letters being_absent, such also being_present in_work.
   12 For not we_are_daring to_classify or to_compare ourselves, with_some of_the ones themselves commending, but they among themselves, themselves measuring and comparing themselves with_themselves, not are_understanding.
   13 But we not into the immeasurable will_be_boasting, but according_to the measure of_the domain, of_which allotted to_us god of_a_measure, to_reach until also of_you_all.
   14 not not For as reaching to you_all, we_are_overextending ourselves, for until also of_you_all we_came in the gospel of_the chosen_one/messiah, 15 not to the immeasurable boasting in another's labors, but hope having, being_grown of_the faith of_you_all, among you_all to_be_magnified according_to the domain of_us to abundance, 16 to the parts beyond you_all to_gospel_preach, not in another's domain for the ready things to_boast.
   17 But the one boasting, in the_master him _let_be_boasting.
   18 For not the one himself commending, that one approved, is, but whom the master is_commending.
  Co-2 11  I_wish you_all_were_tolerating of_me little some of_foolishness, but even are_tolerating of_me.
   2 For I_am_being_jealous for_you_all of_god with_the_jealousy, for I_joined you_all to_one husband, a_virgin pure to_present to_the chosen_one.
   3 But I_am_fearing, lest somehow as the serpent deceived Rx-G‹H‹Eua/(Ḩavvāh)›H›G-Rx in the craftiness of_him, it_may_be_corrupted the thinking of_you_all from the sincerity and the purity in the chosen_one.
   4 If for indeed the one coming another G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G is_proclaiming whom not we_proclaimed, or a_spirit another you_all_are_receiving which not you_all_received, or gospel another which not you_all_received, well you_all_are_tolerating.
   5 I_am_reckoning for nothing to_have_been_deficient of_the super ambassadors.
   6 But if even ordinary in_speech, but not in_knowledge, but in every way having_revealed in all things to you_all.
   7 Or a_sin I_did myself humbling, in_order_that you_all may_be_exalted, because undeservedly the of_god gospel I_gospel_preached to_you_all.
   8 Other assemblies I_robbed, having_received support for the of_you_all service, 9 and being_present with you_all and having_been_deficient, not I_burdened of_no_one, for the need of_me replenishing the brothers having_come from G‹Makedonia›G, and in everything unburdensome myself to_you_all I_kept and I_will_be_keeping.
   10 Is the_truth of_chosen_one in me, that boasting this not will_be_being_stopped in me in the regions of_G‹Aⱪaia›G.
   11 For_reason why.
   Because not I_am_loving you_all.
   god has_known I_do.
   12 But what I_am_doing, also I_will_be_doing, in_order_that I_may_cut_off the opportunity of_the ones wanting an_opportunity, in_order_that in what they_are_boasting, they_may_be_found as also we.
   13 For such are false_emissaries, workers deceitful, masquerading themselves for ambassadors of_chosen_one/messiah.
   14 And no wonder, for himself G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G is_masquerading for an_angel of_light.
   15 Not therefore great it_is, if also the servants of_him are_masquerading as servants of_righteousness, whose end will_be according_to the works of_them.
   16 Again I_am_saying, no someone me may_suppose foolish to_be, but if not surely even_if as foolish receive me, in_order_that also_I little some may_boast.
   17 What I_am_speaking, not according_to the_master I_am_speaking, but as in foolishness, in this confidence of_boasting.
   18 Because many are_boasting according_to the_flesh, also_I will_be_boasting.
   19 For gladly you_all_are_tolerating of_the foolish, prudent being.
   20 For you_all_are_tolerating, if anyone you_all is_enslaving, if anyone is_devouring you_all, if anyone is_taking you_all, if anyone is_lifting_up himself, if anyone in the_face you_all is_beating you_all.
   21 Concerning dishonor I_am_saying as that we have_faltered.
   In but whatever anyone may_be_daring (in foolishness I_am_speaking), I_am_daring also_I.
   22 G‹Hebraios›G they_are.
   Also_I.
   G‹H‹ones_from_Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G they_are.
   Also_I.
   Descendants of_G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G they_are.
   Also_I.
   23 Servants of_chosen_one they_are.
   (Being_insane I_am_speaking), above them I am: in labors more_abundantly, in prisons more_abundantly, in beatings beyond_measure, in deaths often.
   24 By the_G‹Youdaiōns›G five_times forty less one I_received, 25 thrice I_was_beating_with_rods, once I_was_stoned, thrice I_suffered_shipwreck, a_night_and_day in the deep I_have_done, 26 in_journeys often, in_dangers of_rivers, in_dangers of_robbers, in_dangers from my_race, in_dangers from the_pagans, in_dangers in the_city, in_dangers in the_desert, in_dangers on the_sea, in_dangers among false_brothers, 27 in_labor and hardship, in watchings often, in famine and thirst, in fastings often, in cold and nakedness.
   28 Apart_from the things externally, the opposition to_me on day, the worry of_all the assemblies.
   29 Who is_faltering, and not I_am_faltering.
   Who is_being_stumbled, and not I am_being_burned.
   30 If to_be_boasting it_is_fitting, the things of_my_weakness I_will_be_boasting.
   31 The god and father of_the master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G has_known, the one being blessed to the ages, that not I_am_lying.
   32 In G‹H‹Damaskos/(Dammeseq)›H›G the governor of_G‹Aretas›G the king was_guarding the city of_the_G‹H‹from_Damaskos/(Dammeseq)›H›G to_arrest me, wanting, 33 but through a_window in a_basket, I_was_lowered through the wall and I_escaped the hands of_him.
  Co-2 12  To_be_boasting it_is_fitting, not benefitting indeed, I_will_be_coming and to visions and revelations of_the_master.
   2 I_have_known a_man in chosen_one/messiah before fourteen years (whether in the_body not I_have_known, or outside the body not I_have_known, god has_known), having_been_snatched such to the_third heaven.
   3 And I_have_known such a_man (whether in the_body or apart_from the body not I_have_known, god has_known), 4 that was_snatched into paradise, and heard inexpressible words, which it_is not permitting to_a_human to_speak.
   5 Concerning such man, I_will_be_boasting, but concerning myself, not I_will_be_boasting, except in my weaknesses.
   6 For if I_may_want to_boast, not I_will_be foolish, for the_truth I_will_be_speaking, but I_am_refraining, lest anyone to me may_reckon beyond what he_is_seeing in_me, or is_hearing of me.
   7 And by_the excess of_the revelations, therefore in_order_that not I _may_be_being_exalted, was_given to_me a_thorn in_my flesh, a_messenger of_G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G, in_order_that me he_may_be_tormenting, in_order_that not I _may_be_being_exalted.
   8 For this thrice the master I_implored that he_may_withdraw from me.
   9 And he_has_said to_me: Is_sufficing for_you the grace of_me, for the power in weakness is_being_finished.
   Therefore most_gladly rather I_will_be_boasting in the weaknesses of_me, in_order_that may_take_residence in me the power of_the chosen_one.
   10 Therefore I_am_taking_pleasure in weaknesses, in insults, in distresses, in persecutions, and distresses, for chosen_one, for whenever I_may_be_faltering, then powerful I_am.
   11 I_have_become foolish, you_all me compelled.
   For I was_ought by you_all to_be_being_commended.
   For nothing any I_being_deficient of_the super ambassadors, if even nothing I_am.
   12 The indeed signs of_the ambassador was_produced among you_all in all endurance, and in_signs, and wonders, and miracles.
   13 For what is it that you_all_were_lessened beyond the rest of_the_assemblies, except that myself I not burdened of_you_all.
   Forgive to_me unrighteousness this.
   14 See third time this ready I_am_having to_come to you_all, and not I_will_be_burdening, for not I_am_seeking what is of_you_all, but you_all, for not ought the children for_the parents to_be_storing_up, but the parents for_the children.
   15 And I most_gladly will_be_spending and will_be_being_spent_out for the souls of_you_all.
   If more_abundantly you_all loving, less I_am_being_loved.
   16 But it_let_be, I not burdened_down you_all, but being crafty by_deceit, you_all I_took.
   17 Not anyone of_whom I_have_sent_out to you_all, by him I_exploited you_all.
   18 I_implored G‹Titos›G and I_sent_with him the brother.
   Surely_not exploited you_all G‹Titos›G.
   Not in_the same spirit we_walked not in_the same steps.
   19 Already you_all_are_supposing that to_you_all we_are_defending.
   In_front_of god in chosen_one/messiah we_are_speaking.
   And the things all, beloved, for the of_you_all building are.
   20 For I_am_fearing, lest somehow having_come not such_as I_am_wanting, I_may_find you_all, and_I may_be_found by_you_all such_as not you_all_are_wanting, lest somehow strife, jealousy, rages, selfish_ambitions, slanders, gossips, conceits, disturbances, 21 lest again having_come of_me, will_be_humbling me the god of_me to you_all, and I_may_mourn many of_the ones having_previously_sinned, and not having_repented for the impurity, and sexual_immorality, and wantonness, which they_practiced.
  Co-2 13  Third time this I_am_coming to you_all.
   In of_two the_mouth witnesses and three will_be_being_established every word.
   2 I_have_previously_said and I_am_previously_saying, as being_present the second time, and being_absent now to_the ones having_previously_sinned, and to_the rest all, that if I_may_come to the same again, not I_will_be_sparing anyone.
   3 Because proof you_all_are_seeking in me speaking of_chosen_one, who toward you_all not is_faltering, but is_able among you_all.
   4 For also he_was_impaled_on_a_stake of weakness, but is_living by the_power of_god.
   For also we are_faltering with him, but we_will_be_living with him by the_power of_god toward you_all.
   5 Yourselves be_testing whether you_all_are in the faith, yourselves be_approving.
   Or not you_all_are_recognizing yourselves, that chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G in you_all, if surely_not unqualified you_all_are.
   6 But I_am_hoping that you_all_will_be_knowing that we not are unqualified.
   7 And we_are_hoping to god not to_do to_you_all evil nothing, not in_order_that we approved may_be_seen, but in_order_that you_all good may_be_doing, and we as unqualified may_be_may_be.
   8 For not we_are_being_able to_do anything against the truth, but for the truth.
   9 For we_are_rejoicing whenever we may_be_faltering, but you_all powerful may_be.
   This also we_are_hoping, the of_you_all completion.
   10 Because_of this these things being_absent I_am_writing, in_order_that being_present not severely I_may_give_treatment, according_to the authority that the master gave to_me for building and not for tearing_down.
   11 Finally brothers, be_rejoicing, be_being_prepared, be_being_comforted, the same be_thinking, be_being_at_peace, and the god of_love and peace will_be with you_all.
   12 Greet one_another with a_holy kiss.
   Are_greeting you_all the holy ones all.
   13 The grace of_the master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, and the love of_god, and the fellowship of_the holy spirit, with all of_you_all be.

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

G‹Galatikos›Gs

1  G‹Paulos›G, an_ambassador (not from humans, nor through human_origin, but through G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, and god the_father having_raised him from the_dead), 2 and the ones with me all the_brothers, to_the assemblies of_Rx-G‹Galatia›G-Rx: 3 grace to_you_all and peace from god the_father and the_master of_us G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, 4 the one having_given himself concerning the sins of_us, so_that he_may_rescue us out_of the age having_presented evil, according_to the will of_the god and father of_us, 5 to_whom is the glory to the ages of_the ages.
   Truly.
   6 I_am_Rx-marvelling-Rx that thus quickly, you_all_are_replacing from the one having_called you_all in the_grace of_chosen_one, to a_another gospel, 7 which not is another one, except some are who disturbing you_all, and wanting to_alter the gospel of_the chosen_one.
   8 But even if we or an_angel out_of heaven you_all may_be_gospel_preaching contrary_to what we_gospel_preached to_you_all, a_curse him_let_be.
   9 As we_have_previously_said, even now again I_am_saying, if anyone to_you_all is_gospel_preaching contrary_to what you_all_received, a_curse him_let_be.
   10 For now people I_am_persuading or god.
   Or I_am_seeking to_people to_be_bringing_pleasure.
   If still to_people I_was_bringing_pleasure, of_chosen_one a_slave not I_was.
   11 For I_am_making_known to_you_all, brothers, the gospel having_been_gospel_preached by me, that not it_is according_to human_origin.
   12 For neither I from human_origin received it, nor I_was_taught it, but by a_revelation of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   13 For you_all_heard my conduct once in Judaism, that as excess I_was_persecuting the assembly of_god, and was_persecuting it.
   14 And I_was_progressing in Judaism beyond many contemporaries in the descent of_me, more_abundantly zealous being of_the paternal of_me traditions.
   15 But when took_pleasure the one, having_set_apart me from the_womb of_the_mother of_me, and having_called me by the grace of_him, 16 to_reveal the son of_him in me, in_order_that I_may_be_gospel_preaching him among the pagans, immediately not I_consulted with_flesh and blood, 17 nor I_went_away to G‹H‹Hierousalēm/(Yərūshālam)›H›G to the before me ambassadors, but I_went_away into G‹Arabia›G, and again I_returned to G‹H‹Damaskos/(Dammeseq)›H›G.
   18 Then after three years, I_went_up to G‹H‹Hierousalēm to_become_acquainted with_G‹Kēfas›G, and I_remained_on with him fifteen days.
   19 But other of_the ambassadors not I_saw, except G‹H‹Yakōbos/(Ya'aqov)›H›G, the brother of_the master.
   20 And what I_am_writing to_you_all, see, before god, that not I_am_lying.
   21 Then I_came into the regions of_Rx-G‹H‹Suria/('Arām)›H›G-Rx and G‹Kilikia›G.
   22 And I_was being_not_known by_face to_the assemblies of_Rx-G‹Youdaia›G-Rx, in chosen_one/messiah, 23 but only hearing they_were, The one persecuting us once, now is_gospel_preaching the faith, which once he_was_persecuting.
   24 And they_were_glorifying in me god.
  Gal 2  Then through fourteen years, again I_went_up to G‹H‹Hierousalēm with G‹Barnabas›G, having_taken_along_with also G‹Titos›G, 2 and I_went_up according_to a_revelation, and I_placed_before before_them the gospel that I_am_proclaiming among the pagans, by but myself to_the ones supposing, lest somehow in vain I_may_be_running or I_ran.
   3 But not_even G‹Titos›G who was with me, a_Rx-G‹Hellēn›G-Rx being, was_compelled to_be_circumcised.
   4 But because_of the sneaked_in false_brothers, who slipped_in to_spy_out the freedom of_us, which we_are_having in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, in_order_that us they_will_be_enslaving, 5 to_whom not_even for an_hour we_yielded in_submission, in_order_that the truth of_the gospel may_continue with you_all.
   6 But of the ones supposing to_be something (what_kind once they_were, nothing to_me is_carrying_value, the_appearance god of_a_person not is_receiving), for to_me the ones supposing nothing they_contributed.
   7 But instead having_seen that I_have_been_entrusted the gospel of_the uncircumcision, as G‹Petros›G of_the circumcision 8 (for the one having_worked in_G‹Petros›G for commission of_the circumcision, worked in_also_me toward the pagans), 9 and having_known the grace having_been_given to_me, G‹H‹Yakōbos and G‹Kēfas›G, and G‹Yōannēs›G, the ones supposing pillars to_be, the_right hands they_gave to_me and G‹Barnabas›G of_fellowship, in_order_that we may_go to the pagans, and they to the circumcision, 10 only about_the poor that we_may_be_remembering, that also I_was_earnest same thing this to_do.
   11 But when came G‹Kēfas›G to G‹Antioⱪeia›G, to his_face against_him I_resisted, because having_been_condemned he_was.
   12 Before for the time to_come some from G‹H‹Yakōbos, with the pagans he_was_eating_with, but when he_came, he_was_shrinking_back and was_setting_apart himself, fearing the ones of the_circumcision.
   13 And were_acting_hypocritically with_him the rest of_the_G‹Youdaiōns›G, so_that even G‹Barnabas›G was_carried_away of_them by_the hypocrisy.
   14 But when I_saw that not they_are_walking_straight with the truth of_the gospel, I_said to_G‹Kēfas›G before all: If you a_Rx-G‹Youdaios›G-Rx, being paganly and not G‹Youdaiōns›G are_living, how the pagans you_are_compelling to_be_Judaizing.
   15 We are by_nature G‹Youdaiōns›G and not of the_pagans sinners, 16 but having_known that not is_being_justified a_person by works of_law, if not through faith in_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, even we in G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one believed, in_order_that we_may_be_justified by faith in_chosen_one, and not by works of_law, because by the_works of_law, not will_be_being_justified any flesh.
   17 But if seeking to_be_justified in chosen_one, we_were_found also ourselves sinners, consequently is chosen_one of_sin a_servant.
   Never it_might_become.
   18 For if that I_torn_down, these things again I_am_building, a_transgressor myself I_am_demonstrating.
   19 For I through the_law to_the_law died_off, in_order_that to_god I_may_live.
   ˱With˲_chosen_one I_have_been_impaled_on_a_stake_with, 20 and I_am_living, no_longer it_is I, but is_living in me chosen_one, and what now I_am_living in the_flesh, in faith I_am_living in_the of_god, and chosen_one, the one having_loved me, and having_given_over himself for me.
   21 Not I_am_rejecting the grace of_god, for if through the_law righteousness is, consequently chosen_one undeservedly died_off.
  Gal 3  Rx-Oh-Rx foolish G‹Galatikos›Gs.
   Who you_all bewitched, to_whom by your_eyes G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one was_publicly_portrayed having_been_impaled_on_a_stake.
   2 This only I_am_wanting to_learn from you_all: by works of_law the spirit you_all_received, or by hearing with_faith.
   3 Thus foolish you_all_are.
   Having_begun in_the_spirit, now in_the_flesh you_all_are_accomplishing.
   4 So_many things you_all_suffered vainly, if surely also vainly.
   5 Therefore the one supplying to_you_all the spirit and working miracles among you_all, by the_works of_law or by hearing with_faith is_it.
   6 As G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G believed in_god and it_was_reckoned to_him for righteousness.
   7 Be_knowing consequently that the ones of faith, these the_sons are of_G‹H‹Abra'am.
   8 And having_foreseen the scripture that by faith is_justifying the pagans god, he_foretold_the_gospel to_G‹H‹Abra'am, will_be_being_blessed in you all the nations.
   9 So_then the ones of faith are_being_blessed with the believing G‹H‹Abra'am.
   10 For as_many_as of the_works of_law are under a_curse are, for it_has_been_written, cursed is everyone who not is_remaining_in in_all the things having_been_written in the scroll of_the law, to_do them.
   11 And that by the_law, no_one is_being_justified before god evident it_is, because: the righteous by faith will_be_living.
   12 And the law not is of faith, but: the one having_done them, will_be_living by them.
   13 chosen_one/messiah us redeemed from the curse of_the law, having_become for us a_curse, because it_has_been_written: cursed is everyone having_hanged on a_tree, 14 in_order_that to the pagans the blessing of_G‹H‹Abra'am may_become in chosen_one of_G‹H‹Yēsous, in_order_that the promise of_the spirit we_may_receive through faith.
   15 Brothers, according_to human_origin I_am_speaking.
   Likewise of_a_human having_been_confirmed a_covenant, no_one is_rejecting or is_adding_conditions.
   16 And to_G‹H‹Abra'am were_spoken the promises and to_the seed of_him.
   Not he_is_saying: And to_the seeds, as concerning many, but as concerning one: and to_the seed of_you, which is chosen_one.
   17 And this I_am_saying: the_covenant having_been_previously_ratified by god, the after four_hundred and thirty years having_become law not is_annulling, as_in_order that to_nullify the promise.
   18 For if by the_law the inheritance is, no_longer it_is by a_promise, but to_G‹H‹Abra'am through a_promise has_granted it god.
   19 Therefore why the law.
   The transgressions for_reason_of it_was_added, until of_which may_come the seed to_whom he_has_been_promised, having_been_directed through angels in the_hand of_a_mediator.
   20 And the mediator for_one party not is, but god one is.
   21 Therefore the law is against the promises of_god.
   Never it_might_become.
   For if was_given a_law being_able to_give_life, really by the_law would was righteousness.
   22 But imprisoned the scripture the things all under sin, in_order_that the promise by faith in_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one may_be_given to_the ones believing.
   23 Before but the time to_come faith, under the_law we_were_being_guarded, being_imprisoned to the going faith to_be_revealed.
   24 So_that the law, tutor of_us became to chosen_one, in_order_that by faith we_may_be_justified.
   25 But having_come faith, no_longer under a_tutor we_are.
   26 For all sons of_god you_all_are through faith in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   27 For as_many_as to chosen_one were_immersed, chosen_one you_all_dressed_in.
   28 Neither there_is Rx-G‹Youdaios›G-Rx nor Rx-G‹Hellēn›G-Rx, neither there_is slave nor free, neither there_is male and female, for all you_all are in of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous.
   29 And if you_all are of_chosen_one, consequently of_G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G the_seed you_all_are, according_to the_promise heirs.
  Gal 4  And I_am_saying, for as_long_as time as_the heir an_infant is, nothing he_is_carrying_value from_a_slave, master of_all things being, 2 but under guardians he_is and managers, until the appointed_time by_his father.
   3 Thus also we, when we_were infants, under the principles of_the world we_were having_been_enslaved.
   4 But when came the fullness of_the time, sent_away god the son of_him, having_become of woman, having_become under law, 5 in_order_that the ones under the_law he_may_redeem, in_order_that the adoption_as_sons we_may_take_back.
   6 And because you_all_are sons, sent_away god the spirit of_the son of_him into the hearts of_us crying_out: father, father.
   7 So_as no_longer you_are a_slave, but a_son, and if a_son, also an_heir through god.
   8 But then on_one_hand not having_known god, you_all_served for_the ones by_nature not being gods, 9 on_the_other_hand now having_known god, and rather having_been_known by god, how you_all_are_turning_back again to the weak and poor principles, for_which again again to_be_serving you_all_are_wanting.
   10 Days you_all_are_observing, and months, and seasons, and years.
   11 I_am_fearing for_you_all, lest somehow vainly I_have_labored for you_all.
   12 Be_becoming as I am, because also_I am as you_all are, brothers, I_am_beseeching of_you_all.
   Nothing me you_all_did_wrong, 13 but you_all_have_known that because_of weakness of_the flesh, I_gospel_preached to_you_all earlier.
   14 And the trial of_you_all in the flesh of_me, not you_all_scorned nor you_all_disdained, but as a_messenger of_god you_all_received me, as chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G.
   15 Therefore is where the blessing of_you_all.
   For I_am_testifying to_you_all that if possible the eyes of_you_all having_dug_out, you_all_gave them to_me.
   16 So_as enemy of_you_all I_have_become, being_truthful to_you_all.
   17 They_are_being_zealous for_you_all not rightly, but to_exclude you_all they_are_willing, in_order_that for_them you_all_may_be_being_zealous.
   18 But good it_is you_all_are_being_zealous in a_good thing always, and not only in the time to_be_being_present me with you_all.
   19 Children of_me, whom again I_am_laboring_in_birth, until of_which may_be_formed chosen_one/messiah in you_all, 20 but I_was_wanting to_be_being_present with you_all now, and to_change the voice of_me, because I_am_perplexing in you_all.
   21 Be_telling to_me, you_all under the_law wanting to_be, the law not you_all_are_hearing.
   22 For it_has_been_written that Two G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G sons had, one of the servant_girl, and one of the free woman.
   23 But the one of the servant_girl, according_to flesh has_been_born, on_the_other_hand the one of the free woman, through a_promise.
   24 Which things is being_allegorized, for these are two covenants: one on_one_hand from Mount G‹H‹Sina/(Şīnay)›H›G to slavery bearing, which is G‹H‹Hagar/(Hāgār)›H›G.
   25 and G‹H‹Sina Mount is in G‹Arabia›G, and is_corresponding to_the present G‹H‹Hierousalēm/(Yərūshālam)›H›G, she_is_serving for with the children of_her.
   26 On_the_other_hand above G‹H‹Hierousalēm free is, who is the_mother of_us.
   27 For it_has_been_written: be_gladdened, barren woman, you not bearing, break_forth and shout, you not laboring_in_birth, because many are the children of_the desolate more, than of_the woman having the husband.
   28 And you_all brothers, as G‹H‹Isa'ak/(Yiʦəḩāq)›H›G, of_promise children are.
   29 But as then the one according_to flesh having_been_born, was_persecuting the one according_to spirit, thus also now it_is.
   30 But what is_saying the scripture.
   Cast_out the servant_girl and the son of_her, for no not will_be_inheriting the son of_the servant_girl, with the son of_the free woman.
   31 Therefore brothers, not we_are of_the_servant_girl children, but of_the free woman.
  Gal 5  in_freedom, us chosen_one freed, therefore be_standing_firm, and not again in_a_yoke of_slavery be_being_entangled.
   2 See I G‹Paulos›G am_saying to_you_all that if you_all _may_be_being_circumcised, chosen_one you_all nothing will_be_benefiting.
   3 And I_am_testifying again to_every man being_circumcised that a_debtor he_is, all the law to_perform.
   4 You_all_were_released from chosen_one, whoever in the_law are_being_justified, from_the grace you_all_fell_from.
   5 For we by_the_spirit by faith the_hope of_righteousness are_eagerly_waiting.
   6 For in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, neither circumcision anything is_prevailing, nor uncircumcision, but faith through love working.
   7 You_all_were_running well, who you_all hindered, by_the_truth not to_be_being_persuaded.
   8 The persuasion is not of the one calling you_all.
   9 A_little leaven whole the lump is_leavening.
   10 I have_trusted in you_all in the_master that not_one other thing you_all_will_be_thinking.
   But the one disturbing you_all, will_be_bearing the judgment, whoever he_may_be.
   11 But I, brothers, if circumcision still I_am_proclaiming, why still I_am_being_persecuted.
   Consequently has_been_nullified the offense of_the cross.
   12 I_wish also will_be_cutting_off themselves the ones upsetting you_all.
   13 For you_all for freedom were_called, brothers, only not use the freedom for an_opportunity to_the flesh, but through love be_serving for_one_another.
   14 For the whole one law in word has_been_fulfilled, in that: you_will_be_loving the neighbor of_you as yourself.
   15 But if one_another you_all_are_biting and you_all_are_devouring, be_watching_out, lest by one_another you_all_may_be_consumed_up.
   16 But I_am_saying, by_the_spirit be_walking, and the_desire of_the_flesh by_no_means not may_accomplish.
   17 For the flesh is_desiring against the spirit, and the the_spirit against the flesh, these for to_one_another is_opposing, in_order_that not whatever things you_all_may_be_wanting, these things you_all_may_be_doing.
   18 But if by_the_spirit you_all_are_being_led, not you_all_are under the_law.
   19 And manifest is the works of_the flesh, which is sexual_immorality, impurity, wantonness, 20 idolatry, sorcery, enmities, strife, jealousies, rages, selfish_ambitions, dissensions, sects, 21 envies, drunkennesses, carousings, and similar things to_these, which I_am_previously_saying to_you_all, as I_previously_said, that the ones such things doing, the_kingdom of_god not will_be_inheriting.
   22 But the fruit of_the spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith, 23 gentleness, self-control, against such things, no there_is law.
   24 And the ones of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, the flesh impaled_on_a_stake with its passions and desires.
   25 If we_are_living by_the_spirit, by_the_spirit also we_may_be_aligning.
   26 Not we_may_be_becoming conceited, one_another provoking, one_another envying.
  Gal 6  Brothers, if even may_be_previously_caught a_person in a_certain transgression, you_all, the spiritual ones, be_preparing such man in a_spirit of_gentleness, looking_out yourself, lest also you may_be_tempted.
   2 Of_one_another the burdens be_bearing, and thus fulfill the law of_the chosen_one.
   3 For if is_supposing anyone to_be something, nothing being, he_is_deceiving himself.
   4 But the work of_himself let_be_approving and then for himself only the boast will_be_having, and not for another.
   5 For each his own burden will_be_bearing.
   6 And let_be_sharing the one being_instructed in_the word, with_the one instructing him, in all good things.
   7 Not be_being_misled, god not is_being_snubbed.
   For whatever thing may_be_sowing a_person, this also he_will_be_reaping.
   8 Because the one sowing to the flesh of_himself, from the flesh will_be_reaping corruption, but the one sowing to the spirit, from the spirit will_be_reaping life eternal.
   9 And good doing, not we_may_be_losing_heart, for in_time our_own, we_will_be_reaping not being_exhausted.
   10 Therefore consequently, as time we_are_having, we_may_be_working good toward all, and most_of_all toward the household of_the of_faith.
   11 See in_how_much to_you_all letters I_wrote with_my own hand.
   12 As_many_as are_wanting to_appear_good in the_flesh, these are_compelling you_all to_be_being_circumcised, only in_order_that for_the cross of_the chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous not they_are_persecuting.
   13 For and_not the ones having_been_circumcised they the_law are_keeping, but they_are_willing you_all to_be_being_circumcised, in_order_that in the your flesh they_may_boast.
   14 But for_me, never it_might_become to_be_boasting, except in the cross of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, through whom to_me the_world has_been_impaled_on_a_stake, and_I to_the_world.
   15 For neither circumcision anything is, nor uncircumcision, but new creation.
   16 And as_many_as by_principle this will_be_aligning, peace be on them, and mercy, and on the Rx-G‹H‹Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G-Rx of_god.
   17 Of_the rest, troubles to_me no_one let_be_bringing_about, for I the marks of_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G on the body of_me am_bearing.
   18 The grace of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, with the spirit of_you_all be, brothers.
   Truly.

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

G‹ones_from_Efesos›G

1  G‹Paulos›G, an_ambassador of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G by will of_god, to_the holy ones being and faithful in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous: 2 grace to_you_all and peace from god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   3 Blessed be the god and father of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, the one having_blessed us with every blessing spiritual in the heavenly realms in chosen_one, 4 as he_chose us in him before the_foundation of_the_world, to_be us holy and blameless in_front_of him in love, 5 having_predetermined us for adoption_as_sons through G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one to himself, according_to the good_pleasure of_the will of_him, 6 to the_praise of_the_glory of_the grace of_him, of_which favoured us in the one having_been_loved, 7 in whom we_are_having redemption through the blood of_him, the forgiveness of_transgressions, according_to the riches of_the grace of_him, 8 of_which he_abounded on us in all wisdom and understanding, 9 having_made_known to_us the mystery of_the will of_him, according_to the good_pleasure of_him, which he_purposed in him, 10 for the_management of_the fullness the of_times, to_sum_up the things all in the chosen_one, the things in the heavens, and the things on the earth, in him, 11 in whom also we_were_allotted_inheritance, having_been_predetermined according_to the_purpose of_the one the things all working, according_to the counsel of_the will of_him, 12 in_order that to_be us, to the_praise of_the_glory of_him, the ones having_previously_hoped in the chosen_one, 13 in whom also you_all having_heard the word of_truth, the gospel of_the salvation of_you_all, in whom also having_believed, you_all_were_sealed with_the spirit of_promise holy, 14 who is the_deposit of_the inheritance of_us, to the_redemption of_the procuring, to the_praise of_the glory of_him.
   15 Because_of this, also_I having_heard the among you_all faith in the master G‹H‹Yēsous, and toward all the holy ones, 16 not I_am_ceasing giving_thanks for you_all, mentioning making in the prayers of_me, 17 in_order_that the god of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, the father of_glory, may_give to_you_all the_spirit of_wisdom and revelation, in the_knowledge of_him, 18 having_been_enlightened the eyes of_the heart in_order that to_have_known you_all, what is the hope of_the calling of_him, what are the riches of_the glory of_the inheritance of_him, in the holy ones, 19 and what is the surpassing greatness of_the power of_him toward us, the ones believing according_to the working of_the power of_the strength of_him, 20 which he_has_worked in the chosen_one, having_raised him from the_dead, and having_sat_down him at the_right hand of_him, in the heavenly realms, 21 above every rule, and authority, and power, and mastership, and every name being_named, not only in age this, but also in the one coming, 22 and all things subjected under the feet of_him, and of_him gave to_be head concerning all things to_the assembly, 23 which is the body of_him, the fullness of_the one the things all in all filling.
  Eph 2  And you_all being dead in_the transgressions and the sins of_you_all, 2 in which once you_all_walked, according_to the age of_world this, according_to the ruler of_the authority of_the air, the spirit now working_in in the sons of_disbelief, 3 among whom also we all were_conducted once in the desires of_the flesh of_us, doing the desires of_the flesh and of_its minds, and we_were children by_nature of_severe_anger, as even the rest.
   4 But god rich being in mercy, because_of the great love of_him, which he_loved us, 5 even being us dead in_our transgressions, he_made_alive_together us with with_the chosen_one (by_grace you_all_are having_been_saved), 6 and he_raised_up_with us and he_sat_together us in the heavenly realms in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, 7 in_order_that he_may_display in the ages, coming_over the surpassing riches of_the grace of_him, in kindness to us in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   8 For by_grace you_all_are having_been_saved through faith, also this not of of_you_all, of_god the gift it_is, 9 not from works, in_order_that not anyone may_boast.
   10 For of_him we_are the_workmanship, having_been_created in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G for works good, which previously_prepared god, in_order_that in them we_may_walk.
   11 Therefore be_remembering that once you_all the pagans in the_flesh, the ones being_called the_uncircumcision by the being_called circumcision in the_flesh handmade, 12 that you_all_were at_time that without chosen_one, having_been_estranged from_the citizenship of_Rx-G‹H‹Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G-Rx, and strangers to_the covenants of_the promise, hope not having, and godless in the world.
   13 But now in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, you_all who once being far, were_become near by the blood chosen_one.
   14 For he is the peace of_us, the one having_made both one, and the dividing_wall of_the fence having_broken, the enmity in the flesh of_him, 15 the law of_the commandments in decrees having_nullified, in_order_that the two he_may_create in himself into one new man, making peace, 16 and he_may_reconcile both in one body to_god through the cross, having_killed_off the enmity by it, 17 and having_come, he_gospel_preached: peace to_you_all who were far, and peace to_the ones near, 18 because through him we_are_having access, both by one spirit to the father.
   19 Therefore consequently no_longer you_all_are strangers and sojourners, but you_all_are fellow-citizens of_the holy ones and the_household of_god, 20 having_been_built_up on the foundation of_the ambassadors and prophets, being the_cornerstone himself chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, 21 in whom the_whole the building being_joined_together, is_growing into a_temple holy in the_master, 22 in whom also you_all are_being_built_together, for a_dwelling_place of_god in the_spirit.
  Eph 3  This for_reason_of, I G‹Paulos›G, the prisoner of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous for you_all pagans, 2 if surely you_all_heard the management of_the grace of_god, having_been_given to_me for you_all, 3 by revelation was_made_known to_me the mystery, as I_previously_wrote in short, 4 to which you_all_are_being_able reading it to_understand the insight of_me in the mystery of_the chosen_one, 5 which in_other generations not was_made_known to_the sons of_men, as now was_revealed to_the holy ambassadors of_him and prophets in the_spirit, 6 to_be the pagans, fellow-heirs, and a_fellow-body_members, and fellow-partakers, of_the promise in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, through the gospel, 7 of_which I_was_become a_servant according_to the gift of_the grace of_god having_been_given to_me, according_to the working of_the power of_him.
   8 To_me the, very_least of_all the_holy ones, was_given grace this, to_the pagans to_gospel_preach, the untraceable riches of_the chosen_one, 9 and to_enlighten all, what is the management of_the mystery, having_been_hidden_away from the ages in god, the one the things all having_created, 10 in_order_that may_be_made_known now to_the rulers and the authorities in the heavenly realms through the assembly the manifold wisdom of_god, 11 according_to the_purpose of_the ages, which he_established in the chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, the master of_us, 12 in whom we_are_having boldness and access in confidence by the faith in_him.
   13 Therefore I_am_requesting you_all not to_be_losing_heart at the tribulations of_me for you_all, which is the_glory of_you_all.
   14 This for_reason_of, I_am_bowing the knees of_me to the father, 15 of whom every family in the_heavens and on earth is_being_named, 16 in_order_that he_may_give to_you_all according_to the riches of_the glory of_him, with_power to_be_strengthened by the spirit of_him in the inside person, 17 to_dwell_in the chosen_one through faith in the hearts of_you_all in love, having_been_rooted and having_been_established, 18 in_order_that you_all_may_have_strength to_grasp with all the holy ones, what is the breadth, and length, and height, and depth, 19 and to_know the surpassing of_knowledge love of_the chosen_one, in_order_that it_may_be_filled all the fullness of_god.
   20 And to_the one being_able above all things, to_do exceedingly that we_are_requesting or are_understanding, according_to the power working in us, 21 to_him be the glory in the assembly and in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, to all the generations of_the age of_the ages.
   Truly.
   Eph 4  Therefore I_am_exhorting you_all, I the prisoner in the_master, worthily to_walk of_the calling to_which you_all_were_called, 2 with all humility and gentleness, with patience, tolerating of_one_another in love, 3 being_earnest to_be_keeping the oneness of_the spirit in the bond of_peace.
   4 ˱There_is˲_one one body and spirit, as also you_all_were_called in one hope of_the calling of_you_all, 5 one Rx-one-Rx, master one, faith immersion, 6 one god and father of_all, who is over all, and through all, and in all.
   7 But one to_each of_us was_given grace, according_to the measure of_the gift of_the chosen_one/messiah.
   8 Therefore he_is_saying: having_gone_up to height, he_captured captivity, he_gave gifts to_people.
   9 And : he_went_up, what is it, except that also he_came_down into the lower parts of_the earth.
   10 The one having_come_down himself is also the one having_gone_up above all the heavens, in_order_that he_may_fill the things all.
   11 And he gave the on_one_hand ambassadors, on_the_other_hand the prophets, on_the_other_hand the gospel_preachers, on_the_other_hand the shepherds and teachers, 12 with the completing of_the holy ones for the_work of_service, for the_building of_the body of_the chosen_one, 13 until we_may_attain all to the oneness of_the faith, and of_the knowledge of_the son of_god, to a_man mature, to the_measure of_the_stature of_the fullness of_the chosen_one, 14 in_order_that no_longer we_may_be_may_be infants, being_tossed_by_waves and being_carried_about by_every wind of_teaching in the trickery of_people, in craftiness with the scheming of_deception, 15 but being_truthful in love, we_may_grow into him in_the things all, who is the head chosen_one, 16 from whom all the body, being_joined_together and being_held_together by every joint of_its supply according_to the_working in the_measure of_one each part, the growth of_the body is_making to the_building of_itself in love.
   17 Therefore this I_am_saying and I_am_testifying in the_master, no_longer you_all to_be_walking, as also the pagans is_walking in the_uselessness of_the mind of_them.
   18 Having_been_darkened in_their mind being, having_been_estranged from_the life of_god, because_of the ignorance being in them, because_of the hardening of_the heart of_them, 19 who having_languished, themselves gave_over to_wantonness for the_working of_impurity all with greediness.
   20 But you_all not thus learned the chosen_one, 21 if surely him you_all_heard and in him you_all_were_taught, as is the_truth in G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, 22 to_put_away you_all according_to your earlier conduct the old person, which being_corrupted according_to the desires of_seduction, 23 and to_be_being_renewed in_the spirit of_the mind of_you_all, 24 and dress_in the new person according_to god, having_been_created in righteousness and devoutness of_truth.
   25 Therefore having_put_away falsehood: be_speaking the_truth each with the one near him, because we_are of_one_another members.
   26 Be_being_angered, and_yet not be_sinning, the sun not let_be_set_down on the_anger of_you_all, 27 not be_giving place to_the devil.
   28 The one stealing no_longer let_be_stealing, but rather him _let_be_laboring, working with_his hands good, in_order_that he_may_be_having to_be_sharing to_the one need having.
   29 Any word bad out_of the mouth of_you_all not let_be_going_out, but if any good for building of_the need, in_order_that it_may_give grace to_the ones hearing.
   30 And not be_sorrowing the spirit holy of_god, by whom you_all_were_sealed for the_day of_redemption.
   31 All bitterness, and rage, and severe_anger, and clamor, and slander, let_be_taken_away from you_all with all malice.
   32 Be_becoming to one_another good, tender-hearted, forgiving to_yourselves, as also god in chosen_one/messiah forgave to_you_all.
  Eph 5  Therefore be_becoming imitators of_god as children beloved, 2 and be_walking in love, as also the chosen_one loved you_all, and gave_over himself for us, an_offering and a_sacrifice to_god into an_aroma of_a_sweet_fragrance.
   3 But sexual_immorality, and impurity all, or greediness, not it _let_be_being_named among you_all, as is_befitting to_holy ones, 4 and filthiness, and foolish_talk, or crude_joking, which not was_fitting, but rather thanksgiving.
   5 For this be_having/_known knowing that any sexually_immoral, or unclean, or coveter, who is an_idolater, not is_having inheritance in the kingdom of_the chosen_one and of_god.
   6 No_one you_all let_be_seducing with_empty words because_of for, these things is_coming the severe_anger of_god on the sons of_disbelief.
   7 Therefore not be_becoming fellow-partakers with_them, 8 for you_all_were once darkness, but now light in the_master, as children of_light be_walking 9 (for the the_fruit of_the light is in all goodness, and righteousness, and truth), 10 approving what is well_pleasing to_the master.
   11 And not be_participating with_the works unfruitful of_darkness, but rather even be_rebuking them, 12 for the things secretly becoming by them, shameful it_is even to_be_speaking.
   13 But the things all being_rebuked by the light is_being_revealed, for everything being_revealed light is.
   14 Therefore he_is_saying: be_raising, you sleeping, and rise_up from the dead, and will_be_shining_upon ˱upon˲_you the chosen_one.
   15 Therefore be_watching_out exactly how you_all_are_walking, not as unwise, but as wise, 16 redeeming the time, because the days evil are.
   17 Because_of this, not be_becoming foolish, but be_understanding what the will of_the master is.
   18 And not be_being_drunk with_wine, in which is intemperance, but be_being_filled with the_spirit, 19 speaking to_themselves in psalms, and hymns, and songs singing and singing_praises in_the heart of_you_all to_the master, 20 giving_thanks always for all things in the_name of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one, to_god even the_father, 21 being_subjected to_one_another in reverence of_chosen_one/messiah.
   22 wives be to_their own husbands as to_the master, 23 because the_husband is head of_the wife, as also the chosen_one is the_head of_the assembly, he the_Rx-saviour-Rx of_the body.
   24 But as the assembly is_being_subjected to_the chosen_one, thus also the wives to_their husbands in everything.
   25 men be_loving your wives, as also the chosen_one loved the assembly, and himself gave_over for her, 26 in_order_that her he_may_sanctify, having_cleansed her by_the washing of_water by the_word, 27 in_order_that he_may_present he to_himself glorious the assembly, not having stain, or wrinkle, or anything of_the such, but in_order_that it_may_be holy and blameless.
   28 Thus are_ought also husbands to_be_loving the of_themselves wives, as the of_themselves bodies.
   The one loving the of_himself wife, himself is_loving.
   29 For no_one once the of_himself flesh hated, but is_nurturing and is_cherishing it, as also does the chosen_one for_the assembly, 30 because members we_are of_the body of_him.
   31 For this will_be_leaving a_man his father and mother, and will_be_being_joined to_the wife of_him, and will_be the two into one flesh 32 mystery this great is, but I am_speaking for chosen_one and for the assembly.
   33 However also you_all, ˱one˲_by one, each the of_himself wife thus him _let_be_loving as himself, and the wife, in_order_that she_may_be_revering her husband.
  Eph 6  children, be_submitting to_the parents of_you_all in the_master, for this is right.
   2 Be_honoring the father of_you and the mother (which is commandment the_first with a_promise), 3 in_order_that well with_you it_may_become, and you_will_be a_long_time on the earth.
   4 And, fathers, not be_angering the children of_you_all, but be_nurturing them in the_discipline and admonition of_the_master.
   5 slaves, be_submitting to_your according_to flesh masters with respect and trembling, in sincerity of_the heart of_you_all as to_the chosen_one, 6 not with eyeservice as men_pleasing, but as slaves of_chosen_one, doing the will of_god from the_heart, 7 with good_will serving as to_the master, and not to_people, 8 having_known that may_do each good, this he_will_be_receiving_back from the_master, whether slave or free.
   9 And, masters, the same things be_doing toward them, giving_up the threat, having_known that both of_them and of_you_all the Master is in the_heavens, and favouritism not is with him.
   10 Of_the rest, be_being_enabled, in the_master and in the power of_the strength of_him.
   11 Dress_in the whole_armor of_god, for that to_be_able you_all to_stand against the schemings of_the devil.
   12 Because not is to_us the wrestling against blood and flesh, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the world_rulers of_darkness this, against the spiritual of_wickedness in the heavenly realms.
   13 Because_of this, take_up the whole_armor of_god, in_order_that you_all_may_be_able to_resist in the day evil, and all things having_produced, to_stand.
   14 Therefore stand: having_girded_about the waist of_you_all with truth, and having_dressed_in the breastplate of_righteousness, 15 and having_shod your feet with the_readiness of_the gospel of_peace.
   16 In all things having_taken_up the shield of_faith, with which you_all_will_be_able all the arrows of_the evil one having_been_burned to_extinguish.
   17 And the helmet of_salvation receive, and the sword of_the spirit, which is the_word of_god, 18 by all prayer and petition, praying in every season in the_spirit, and to the_same thing, watching with all perseverance and petition for all the holy ones, 19 and for me, in_order_that to_me may_be_given speech in the_opening of_the mouth of_me, with boldness to_make_known the mystery of_the gospel, 20 for which I_am_being_an_ambassador in a_chain, in_order_that it I_may_speak_boldly, as it_is_fitting me to_speak.
   21 But in_order_that may_have_known also you_all the things concerning me, what I_am_doing, all things will_be_making_known to_you_all G‹Tuⱪikos›G, the beloved brother and faithful servant in the_master, 22 whom I_sent to you_all for same thing this, in_order_that you_all_may_know the things concerning us, and he_may_comfort the hearts of_you_all.
   23 Peace be to_the brothers and love with faith from god the_father and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah.
   24 grace be with all the ones loving the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, in indestructibility.
