USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

G‹Filippēsios›G

1  G‹Paulos›G and G‹Timotheos›G, slaves of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, to_all the holy ones in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous being in Rx-G‹Filippou›G-Rx, with the_overseers and servants: 2 grace to_you_all and peace from god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   3 I_am_giving_thanks to_the god of_me on every mentioning of_you_all, 4 always in every petition of_me for all of_you_all, with joy the petition making, 5 for the fellowship of_you_all in the gospel, from the first day until the time now, 6 having_persuaded same thing this, that the one having_begun in you_all a_work good, will_be_accomplishing it until the_day of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, 7 as it_is right for_me this to_be_thinking about all of_you_all, because_of that to_be_having me in my heart you_all, in both the bonds of_me, and in the defense and confirmation of_the gospel, fellow-partakers with_me of_the grace all you_all being.
   8 For witness of_me god is, how I_am_longing_for all you_all in the_compassions of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   9 And this I_am_praying, that the love of_you_all still more and more may_be_abounding in knowledge and all insight, 10 in_order that to_be_approving you_all the things carrying_value, in_order_that you_all_may_be sincere and inoffensive to the_day of_chosen_one, 11 having_been_filled with_the_fruit of_righteousness through G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, to the_glory and praise of_god.
   12 And to_be_knowing you_all, I_am_wishing, brothers, that the things concerning me, more to the_progress of_the gospel has_come, 13 so_as the bonds of_me manifest in chosen_one to_become, in all the residence_of_the_governor and to_the rest all, 14 and more of_the brothers in the_master having_trusted by_the_bonds of_me, more_abundantly to_be_daring fearlessly the word of_god to_be_speaking.
   15 Some on_one_hand even because_of envy and strife, on_the_other_hand some also because_of goodwill the chosen_one are_proclaiming.
   16 The ones on_the_other_hand out_of selfish_ambition the chosen_one are_proclaiming, not purely supposing tribulation to_be_raising to_the bonds of_me.
   17 The ones indeed from love having_known that for defense of_the gospel I_am_appointing, 18 for what.
   Except that in_every manner, whether in_under_pretense or in_truth, chosen_one/messiah is_being_proclaimed, and in this I_am_rejoicing, but also I_will_be_being_elated.
   19 I_have_known and that this for_me will_be_turning_out to salvation through the of_you_all petition, and of_the_supply of_the spirit of_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one, 20 according_to the eager_expectation and hope of_me, that in nothing I_will_be_being_ashamed, but in all boldness, as always also now, will_be_being_magnified chosen_one in the body of_me, whether by life or by death.
   21 For to_me to_be_living is chosen_one, and to_die_off is gain.
   22 But if to_be_living in the_flesh, this for_me is the_fruit of_work.
   And what I_may_chose not I_am_making_known.
   23 I_am_being_pressed and by the two, the desire having in_order that to_depart and with chosen_one to_be, for by_much more better, 24 but to_be_remaining_on in the flesh, more_necessary because_of you_all.
   25 And this having_persuaded, I_have_known that I_will_be_remaining and I_will_be_continuing_with with_all you_all for the of_you_all progress and joy of_the faith, 26 in_order_that the boast of_you_all may_be_abounding in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous in me, through my coming again to you_all.
   27 Only worthily of_the gospel of_the chosen_one be_living_as_citizen, in_order_that whether having_come and having_seen you_all, or being_absent, I_may_be_hearing the things concerning you_all, that you_all_are_standing_firm in one with_one, spirit heart contending_together for_the faith of_the gospel, 28 and not being_frightened in nothing by the ones opposing, which is to_them a_sign of_destruction, but to_you_all of_salvation, and this from god, 29 because to_you_all it_was_granted concerning chosen_one, not only on him to_be_believing, but also concerning him to_be_suffering, 30 the same struggle having, such_as you_all_saw in me, and now are_hearing in me.
  Php 2  If therefore any exhortation in chosen_one, if any consolation of_love, if any fellowship of_the_spirit, if anyone has compassions and compassions, 2 fulfill of_me the joy, in_order_that the same thing you_all_may_be_thinking, the same love having, united_in_soul, the one thing thinking.
   3 Nothing do according_to selfish_ambition nor according_to vain_conceit, but in_humility one_another considering the ones being_above of_themselves, 4 not the things of_themselves each looking_out, but also the things of_others each.
   5 This be_thinking in us, which also in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G is, 6 who in the_form of_god being, not advantage considered to_be equal with_god, 7 but himself emptied, the_form of_a_slave having_taken, in the_likeness of_humans having_become.
   And in_form having_been_found as a_human, 8 he_humbled himself, having_become obedient unto death, and the_death of_the_cross.
   9 Therefore also god him highly_exalted, and granted to_him the name above every name, 10 in_order_that at the name of_G‹H‹Yēsous, every knee may_bow of_heavenly and earthly and subterranean realms, 11 and every tongue may_confess that the_master is G‹H‹Yēsous is chosen_one, to the_glory of_god the_father.
   12 So_then, beloved of_me, as always you_all_submitted, not as in the presence of_me only, but now by_much more in the absence of_me, with fear and trembling the of_yourselves salvation be_producing.
   13 For god is the one working in you_all, both to_be_willing, and to_be_working, for his good_pleasure.
   14 All things be_doing without grumblings and speculations, 15 in_order_that you_all_may_become blameless and innocent, children of_god blameless in_the_midst of_a_generation crooked and having_been_perverted, among whom you_all_are_shining as lights in the_world, 16 the_word of_life holding_up to a_boast to_me in the_day of_chosen_one, because not in vain I_ran, nor in vain I_labored, 17 but if even I_am_being_poured_out on the sacrifice and ministry of_the faith of_you_all, I_am_rejoicing and I_am_rejoicing_with with_all you_all.
   18 And the same also you_all be_rejoicing and be_rejoicing_with with_me.
   19 But I_am_hoping in the_master G‹H‹Yēsous, G‹Timotheos›G quickly to_send to_you_all, in_order_that also_I may_be_encouraging, having_known the things concerning you_all.
   20 For no_one I_am_having kindred-spirit, who genuinely the things concerning you_all will_be_caring_for.
   21 The ones for all the things of_themselves are_seeking, not the things of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   22 But the provenness of_him you_all_are_knowing, that as unto_a_father a_child serves, with me he_served in the gospel.
   23 This one therefore on_one_hand I_am_hoping to_send, when I_may_look_out the things concerning me immediately, 24 on_the_other_hand I_have_persuaded in the_master that also myself quickly I_will_be_coming.
   25 But necessary I_considered, G‹Epafroditos›G, the brother and fellow-worker and fellow-soldier of_me, and of_you_all ambassador and minister of_the need of_me, to_send to you_all, 26 since longing_for he_was for_all for_you_all, and distressing because you_all_heard that he_ailed.
   27 For also he_ailed nearly to_death, but god showed_mercy_to him, not and him only, but also me, in_order_that not sorrow on sorrow I_may_have.
   28 Therefore more_earnestly I_sent him, in_order_that having_seen him again, you_all_may_be_elated and_I less_anxious may_be.
   29 Therefore be_accepting him in the_master with all joy, and such honored ones be_having, 30 because because_of the work of_chosen_one/messiah unto death he_neared, having_risked with_his life, in_order_that he_may_fulfill_up the of_you_all lacking, of_the toward me ministry.
  Php 3  For_the rest, brothers of_me, be_rejoicing in the_master.
   The same things to_be_writing to_you_all, to_me is on_one_hand not reluctant, on_the_other_hand for_you_all is secure.
   2 Be_watching_out for_the dogs, be_watching_out for_the evil workers, be_watching_out for_the mutilation.
   3 For we are the circumcision, the ones in_the_spirit of_god worshiping and boasting in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, and not in the_flesh having_trusted, 4 although I having confidence even in the_flesh.
   If any is_supposing other to_have_trusted in the_flesh, I more: 5 in_circumcision the_eight_day of the_descent of_Rx-G‹H‹Israēl/(Yisərā'ēl)›H›G-Rx of_the_tribe of_G‹H‹Beniamin/(Binəyāmīn)›H›G, a_G‹Hebraios›G of G‹Hebraios›G, according_to the_law a_G‹Farisaios_sect_member›G, 6 according_to zeal persecuting the assembly, according_to righteousness which is by the_law having_become blameless.
   7 which things was to_me gain, these I_have_considered because_of the chosen_one loss.
   8 But indeed_rather also I_am_considering all things loss to_be, because_of that being_above the knowledge of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous the master of_me, because_of whom the things all I_was_lost and I_am_considering them rubbish, in_order_that chosen_one I_may_gain 9 and may_be_found in him, not having my own righteousness of the_law, but the righteousness through faith in_chosen_one, the of god righteousness based on faith, 10 to_know him, and the power of_the resurrection of_him, and fellowship of_the_sufferings of_him, being_conformed to_the death of_him, 11 if somehow I_may_attain to the resurrection from the_dead.
   12 Not that already I_received it, or already I_have_been_perfected, but I_am_pursuing, if also I_may_grasp, in that also I_was_grasped by chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   13 Brothers, I myself not am_reckoning to_have_grasped it, but I_do one thing: the things on_one_hand behind forgetting, on_the_other_hand to_the things ahead stretching_out, 14 to the_goal I_am_pursuing for the prize of_the upward calling of_god in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous.
   15 Therefore as_many_as mature are, this we_may_be_thinking, and if anything differently you_all_are_thinking, even this god to_you_all will_be_revealing.
   16 However to what we_attained, by_the same thing to_be_aligning.
   17 Fellow-imitators of_me be_becoming, brothers, and be_observing the ones thus walking, as you_all_are_having for_an_example us.
   18 For many are_walking, of_whom often I_was_telling to_you_all, and now even weeping, I_am_telling you, enemies of_the cross of_the chosen_one, 19 whose end is destruction, of_whose god is their belly, and their glory is in the shame of_them, the ones the earthly things thinking.
   20 For of_us the citizenship in the_heavens is_being, from which also a_Rx-saviour-Rx we_are_eagerly_waiting, the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one, 21 who will_be_adapting the body of_humiliation of_us, similar to_the body of_the glory of_him, according_to the working of_the thing to_be_able him, even to_subject to_him the things all.
  Php 4  So_then, brothers of_me beloved and longed for, joy and crown of_me, thus be_standing_firm in the_master, beloved.
   2 G‹Euodia›G I_am_exhorting, and G‹Suntuⱪē›G I_am_exhorting, the same thing to_be_thinking in the_master.
   3 Yes, I_am_asking also you, genuine companion, be_giving_help to_them, who in the gospel contended_together with_me, with both G‹Klēmēs›G and the rest of_the_fellow-workers of_me, whose names are in the_scroll of_life.
   4 Be_rejoicing in the_master always, again I_will_be_saying, be_rejoicing.
   5 The gentle of_you_all let_be_known to_all people.
   The master near.
   6 Nothing be_worrying, but in everything, by_prayer and petition with thanksgiving, the requests of_you_all let_be_being_made_known to god.
   7 And the peace of_god being_above all mind, will_be_guarding the hearts of_you_all and the thinking of_you_all in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   8 For_the rest, brothers, as_much_as is true, as_much_as dignified, as_much_as right, as_much_as pure, as_much_as lovely, as_much_as admirable, if any virtue, and if any praise, these things be_reckoning.
   9 What both you_all_learned and you_all_received, both you_all_heard and you_all_saw, in me, these things be_practicing, and the god of_peace will_be with you_all.
   10 But I_was_elated in the_master greatly, that now once you_all_revived for me to_be_thinking, to which also you_all_were_thinking, but you_all_were_lacking_season.
   11 Not that concerning poverty I_am_speaking, for I learned in whatever situations I_am content to_be.
   12 I_have_known both to_be_being_humbled, I_have_known and to_be_abounding.
   In everything and in all things I_have_been_enlightened, both to_be_being_satisfied and to_be_hungering, both to_be_abounding and to_be_being_deficient.
   13 All things I_am_being_strong in the one strengthening me.
   14 However well you_all_did, having_participated of_me in_the tribulation.
   15 But have_known also you_all, G‹Filippēsios›G, that in the_beginning of_the gospel, when I_came_out from G‹Makedonia›G, not_one with_me assembly shared in the_matter of_giving and receiving, except you_all only.
   16 Because even in G‹Thessalonikē›G, both once and twice, for the need to_me you_all_sent.
   17 Not that I_am_seeking_after the gift, but I_am_seeking_after the fruit abounding to the_account of_you_all.
   18 But I_am_receiving_fully all things, and I_am_abounding, I_have_been_filled, having_received from G‹Epafroditos›G the things from you_all, an_aroma of_a_sweet_fragrance, a_sacrifice acceptable, well_pleasing to_god.
   19 But the god of_me will_be_filling all the_need of_you_all, according_to the riches of_him in glory in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G.
   20 And to_the god and father of_us be the glory to the ages of_the ages.
   Truly.
   21 Greet every holy one in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, are_greeting you_all the with me brothers, 22 are_greeting you_all all the holy ones, and most_of_all the ones from the of_Rx-G‹Kaisar›G-Rx house.
   23 The grace of_the master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one be with the spirit of_you_all.
   Truly.

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

Colossians

1  G‹Paulos›G, an_ambassador of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G by the_will of_god, and G‹Timotheos›G our brother, 2 to_the in G‹Kolossai›G holy ones, and faithful brothers in chosen_one: grace to_you_all and peace from god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   3 We_are_giving_thanks to_god the_father of_the master of_us G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, always for you_all praying, 4 having_heard the faith of_you_all in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, and the love that you_all_are_having toward all the holy ones, 5 because_of the hope lying_away for_you_all in the heavens, which you_all_previously_heard in the word of_the truth, the gospel, 6 the one being_present to you_all, as also in all the world, is bearing_fruit and being_grown, as also among you_all, from which day you_all_heard and knew the grace of_god in truth, 7 as you_all_learned from G‹Epafras›G, the beloved fellow-slave of_us, who is faithful for us a_servant of_the chosen_one, 8 the one also having_made_evident to_us the of_you_all love in the_spirit.
   9 Because_of this also we, from which day we_heard it, not are_ceasing for you_all praying and requesting, in_order_that you_all_may_be_filled with_the knowledge of_the will of_him in all wisdom and insight spiritual, 10 to_walk worthily of_the master in all pleasing, in every work good bearing_fruit, and being_grown in_the knowledge of_god, 11 with all power being_enabled, according_to the power of_the glory of_him, to all endurance and patience with joy, 12 giving_thanks together_with the father, the one having_qualified you_all for the portion of_the lot of_the holy ones in the light, 13 who rescued us from the power of_darkness, and redirected us into the kingdom of_the son of_the love of_him, 14 in whom we_are_having redemption, the forgiveness of_sins, 15 who is the_image of_the god invisible, the_firstborn of_all creation, 16 because by him was_created the things all in the heavens and on the earth, the visible and the invisible, whether thrones, or masterships, or rulers, or authorities, the things all by him and for him has_been_created.
   17 And he is before all things, and the things all in him has_consisted.
   18 And he is the head of_the body, the assembly, who is the beginning, firstborn from the dead, in_order_that may_become in all things he being_first, 19 because in him he_took_pleasure all the fullness to_dwell, 20 and by him to_reconcile the things all to himself, having_made_peace by the blood of_the cross of_him through him, whether the things on earth, or the things in the heavens.
   21 And you_all once being having_been_estranged and enemies in_mind in your works evil, 22 but now you_all_have_been_reconciled in the body of_the flesh of_him, through his death, to_present you_all holy, and blameless, and unindictable, in_front_of him, 23 if surely you_all_are_continuing_on in_the_faith, having_been_established and firm, and not being_shifted from the hope of_the gospel which you_all_heard, having_been_proclaimed in all creation under heaven, of_which became I G‹Paulos›G a_servant.
   24 Now I_am_rejoicing in the sufferings for you_all, and I_am_filling_up the lacking things of_the tribulations of_the chosen_one/messiah in the flesh of_me for the body of_him, which is the assembly, 25 of_which became I a_servant, according_to the management of_god, having_been_given to_me for you_all to_fulfill the word of_god, 26 the mystery having_been_hidden_away from the ages and from the generations, but now was_revealed to_the holy ones of_him, 27 to_whom willed god, to_make_known what is the riches of_the glory of_mystery this among the pagans, which is chosen_one in you_all, the hope of_glory, 28 whom we are_proclaiming, admonishing every person and teaching every person in all wisdom, in_order_that we_may_present every person perfect in chosen_one.
   29 To which also I_am_laboring, striving according_to the working of_him, working in me in power.
  Col 2  For I_am_wanting you_all to_have_known, how_much a_struggle I_am_having for you_all and the ones in G‹Laodikeia›G, and as_many_as not have_seen the face of_me in the_flesh, 2 in_order_that may_be_comforted the hearts of_them, having_been_held_together in love, and to all the_riches of_the full_assurance of_insight, to the_knowledge of_the mystery of_god, chosen_one, 3 in whom are all the treasures of_wisdom and of_knowledge secret.
   4 This I_am_saying, in_order_that no_one you_all may_be_deluding by persuade_speech.
   5 For if also in_the flesh I_am_being_absent, but in_spirit with you_all I_am, rejoicing and seeing of_you_all the order, and the firmness of_the in chosen_one faith of_you_all.
   6 Therefore as you_all_received chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G the master, in him be_walking, 7 having_been_rooted and being_built_up in him, and being_confirmed in_the faith, as you_all_were_taught, abounding in thanksgiving.
   8 Be_watching_out, lest anyone you_all will_be taking_captive through philosophy and empty seduction, according_to the tradition of_humans, according_to the principles of_the world, and not according_to chosen_one.
   9 Because in him is_dwelling all the fullness of_the deity bodily, 10 and you_all_are in him having_been_fulfilled, he is the head of_all rule and authority, 11 in whom also you_all_were_circumcised with_circumcision not_hand_made, in the disarmament of_the body of_the flesh, by the circumcision of_the chosen_one/messiah, 12 having_been_buried_with with_him in washing, in which also you_all_were_raised_up_with him, through the faith in_the working of_god, having_raised him from the_dead.
   13 And you_all dead being in the transgressions and in_the uncircumcision of_the flesh of_you_all, he_made_alive_together us with him, having_forgiven to_us all our transgressions, 14 having_wiped_out the against us handwriting in_the decrees, which was hostile to_us, and it has_taken_away out_of the midst, having_nailed it to_the cross, 15 having_disarmed the rulers and the authorities, and he_exposed them in public, having_triumphed over_them in him.
   16 Therefore not anyone you_all let_be_judging in food, and in drink, or in regard of_a_feast, or new_moon, or sabbaths, 17 which is a_shadow of_the things coming, but the body is of_the chosen_one.
   18 No_one you_all let_be_disqualifying, willing in humility, and the_worship of_the angels, which he_has_seen detailing, vainly being_arrogant by the mind of_the flesh of_him, 19 and not taking_hold_of the head, from whom all the body by its joints and ligaments being_supplied and being_held_together, is_growing with_the growth of_god.
   20 If you_all_died_off with chosen_one from the principles of_the world, why as_though living in the_world you_all_are_being_indoctrinated: 21 Not you_may_touch.
   Not you_may_taste.
   Not you_may_touch.
   22 Which is all to corruption in_the depletion, according_to the commandments and teachings of_humans.
   23 Which things is an_account indeed having of_wisdom in personal_religion and humility, severity of_the_body, not in honor any against the_indulgence of_the flesh.
  Col 3  Therefore if you_all_were_raised_up_with with_the chosen_one, the things above be_seeking, where the chosen_one is, at the_right hand of_god sitting.
   2 The things above be_thinking, not the things on the earth.
   3 For you_all_died_off, and the life of_you_all has_been_hidden with the chosen_one in god.
   4 Whenever the chosen_one may_be_revealed, the life of_you_all, then also you_all with him will_be_being_revealed in glory.
   5 Therefore make_dead your members which are on the earth: sexual_immorality, impurity, passion, desire evil, and greediness, which is idolatry, 6 because_of which things is_coming the severe_anger of_god, 7 among whom also you_all walked once when you_all_were_living in these things.
   8 But now put_away also you_all the things all: severe_anger, rage, malice, slander, profanity out_of the mouth of_you_all.
   9 Not be_lying to one_another, having_disarmed the old personal with the practices of_him, 10 and having_dressed_in the new man, being_renewed in knowledge, according_to the_image of_the one having_created him, 11 where not there_is Rx-G‹Hellēn›G-Rx and Rx-G‹Youdaios›G-Rx, circumcision and uncircumcision, foreigner, G‹Skuthēs›G, slave, free, but all things and in all is chosen_one/messiah.
   12 Therefore dress_in, as the_chosen of_god holy ones and having_been_loved, hearts of_compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness, patience, 13 tolerating of_one_another and forgiving to_yourselves, if anyone against anyone may_be_having a_complaint, as also the master forgave to_you_all, thus also you_all forgive.
   14 Over and all these things, put_on love, which is the_bond of_perfection.
   15 And the peace of_the chosen_one let_be_deciding in the hearts of_you_all, to which also you_all_were_called in body, and thankful be_becoming.
   16 The word of_the chosen_one let_be_dwelling_in in you_all richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing yourselves in_psalms, hymns, songs spiritual, with thankfulness singing in the hearts of_you_all to_the to_god.
   17 And everything, whatever anything you_all_may_be_doing in word or in work, all in the_name of_the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G do, giving_thanks to_god the_father through him.
   18 wives, be_being_subjected to_your husbands, as was_fitting in the_master.
   19 husbands, be_loving your wives, and not be_being_embittered toward them.
   20 children, be_submitting to_your parents in all things, for this well_pleasing is in the_master.
   21 fathers, not be_provoking the children of_you_all, in_order_that not they_may_be_losing_heart.
   22 slaves, be_submitting in all things to_your according_to flesh masters, not with eyeservice, as men_pleasing, but in sincerity of_heart, revering the master.
   23 Whatever you_all_may_be_doing, with your_heart be_working, as to_the master not to_people, 24 having_known that from the_master you_all_will_be_taking_back the repaying of_your inheritance.
   For_the master chosen_one you_all_are_serving.
   25 The one for doing_wrong, will_be_receiving_back what he_did_wrong, and not there_is favouritism.
  Col 4  masters, what is righteous and equality to_your slaves be_bringing_about, having_known that also you_all are_having a_Master in heaven.
   2 in_prayer be_persevering, watching in it with thanksgiving, 3 praying together also for us, in_order_that god may_open_up to_us a_door for_the word, to_speak the mystery of_the chosen_one/messiah, because_of which also I_have_been_bound, 4 in_order_that I_may_reveal it, as it_is_fitting me to_speak.
   5 In wisdom be_walking toward the ones outside, the time redeeming.
   6 the_speech of_you_all always in grace let_be, with_salt having_been_seasoned, to_have_known how it_is_fitting you_all to_one each to_be_answering.
   7 The things concerning me all will_be_making_known to_you_all G‹Tuⱪikos›G, the beloved brother, and faithful servant, and fellow-slave in the_master, 8 whom I_sent to you_all for same thing this, in_order_that you_all_may_know the things concerning you_all, and he_may_comfort the hearts of_you_all, 9 with G‹Onēsimos›G, the faithful and beloved brother, who is of you_all.
   All things to_you_all they_will_be_making_known the things here.
   10 Is_greeting you_all G‹Aristarⱪos›G, the fellow-prisoner of_me, and Rx-G‹Markos›G-Rx, the cousin of_G‹Barnabas›G (concerning whom you_all_received commandments, if he_may_come to you_all, receive him), 11 and G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, the one being_called G‹Youstos›G, the ones being of the_circumcision these are, the_only fellow-workers for the kingdom of_god, who were_become to_me an_encouragement.
   12 Is_greeting you_all G‹Epafras›G, who is of you_all, a_slave of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, always striving for you_all in the prayers, in_order_that you_all_may_be_stood mature and having_been_fully_assured in all the_will of_god.
   13 For I_am_testifying to_him that he_is_having great distress for you_all, and the ones in G‹Laodikeia›G, and the ones in G‹Hierapolis›G.
   14 Is_greeting you_all G‹Loukas›G, the physician beloved, and G‹Dēmas›G.
   15 Greet the in G‹Laodikeia›G brothers, and G‹Numfas›G, and the in the_house of_them assembly.
   16 And whenever may_be_read among you_all my letter, make that also in the of_the_G‹ones_from_Laodikeia›G assembly it_may_be_read, and the letter from G‹Laodikeia›G that also you_all may_read.
   17 And say to_G‹Arⱪippos›G: Be_watching_out to_the service that you_received in the_master, in_order_that it you_may_be_fulfilling.
   18 The greeting is by_my own hand, of_G‹Paulos›G.
   Be_remembering of_me about_the bonds.
   grace be with you_all.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50

The source table used to create this file is Copyright © 2022 by https://GreekCNTR.org

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

1 G‹ones_from_Thessalonikē›G

1  G‹Paulos›G, and G‹Silouanos›G, and G‹Timotheos›G, to_the assembly of_the_G‹ones_from_Thessalonikē›G in god the_father and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah: grace to_you_all and peace.
   2 We_are_giving_thanks to_god always concerning all of_you_all, remembrance making in the prayers of_us, unceasingly 3 remembering of_you_all about_the work of_faith, and the labor of_love, and the endurance of_hope of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, before the god and father of_us, 4 having_known, brothers having_been_loved by god, the choice of_you_all, 5 because the gospel of_us not was_become to you_all in word only, but also in power, and in the_spirit holy, and full_assurance much, as you_all_have_known such_as we_were_become you_all because_of you_all.
   6 And you_all imitators of_us were_become and of_the master, having_received the word in tribulation much with the_joy of_the_spirit holy, 7 so_as to_become you_all examples to_all the ones believing in G‹Makedonia›G and in G‹Aⱪaia›G.
   8 From for you_all has_been_sounded_out the word of_the master, not only in G‹Makedonia›G and in G‹Aⱪaia›G, but in every place the faith of_you_all toward god has_come_out, so_as no need to_be_having us to_be_speaking anything.
   9 For they concerning us are_reporting what_kind entrance we_had to you_all, and how you_all_turned_back to god from idols, to_be_serving for_the_god living and true, 10 and to_be_waiting for_the son of_him from the heavens, whom he_raised from the dead, G‹H‹Yēsous, the one rescuing us from the severe_anger coming.
  Th-1 2  For yourselves you_all_have_known, brothers, the entrance of_us to you_all, that not vain it_has_become, 2 but having_previously_suffered and having_been_mistreated, as you_all_have_known, in Rx-G‹Filippou›G-Rx we_spoke_boldly in the god of_us, to_speak to you_all the gospel of_god among much struggle.
   3 For the exhortation of_us not of deception, nor of impurity, nor in deceit, 4 but as we_have_been_approved by god, to_be_entrusted the gospel, thus we_are_speaking, not as to_people bringing_pleasure, but to_god, the one approving the hearts of_us.
   5 For neither once with word of_flattery we_were_become, as you_all_have_known, nor with a_under_pretense for_greediness (god is witness) 6 nor seeking from people glory, neither from you_all, nor from others, 7 being_able in burden to_be, as of_chosen_one/messiah ambassadors.
   But we_were_become infants in the_midst of_you_all, as a_nursing_mother may_be_cherishing the of_herself children.
   8 Thus longing for_you_all, we_were_taking_pleasure to_share with_you_all, not only the gospel of_god, but also the of_ourselves lives, because beloved to_us you_all_were_become.
   9 For you_all_are_remembering, brothers, the labor of_us and hardship, night and day working, in_order that not to_burden anyone of_you_all, we_proclaimed to you_all the gospel of_god.
   10 You_all are witnesses and god, how devoutly, and justly, and blamelessly, to_you_all the ones believing we_were_become, 11 just_as you_all_have_known how one each of_you_all, as a_father to_children of_himself, 12 exhorting you_all, and consoling, and testifying, in_order that to_be_walking you_all worthily of_god, the one having_called you_all into the of_himself kingdom and glory.
   13 And because_of this also we are_giving_thanks to_god unceasingly that having_received the_word by_hearing from us of_god, you_all_received not the_word of_humans, but as truly it_is, the_word of_god, which also is_working in you_all believing.
   14 For you_all imitators were_become, brothers, of_the assemblies of_god, being in Rx-G‹Youdaia›G-Rx in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, because the same things you_all_suffered, also you_all by your own fellow-countrymen, as also they did by the G‹Youdaiōns›G, 15 who both the master having_killed_off G‹H‹Yēsous, and their prophets, and us having_driven_out, and to_god not bringing_pleasure, but to_all people of_contrary, 16 forbidding us to_the pagans to_speak, in_order_that they_may_be_saved, for which to_fulfill of_them the sins always.
   But came on them the severe_anger to end.
   17 But we, brothers, having_been_orphaned of you_all, for the_time of_an_hour, in_face not in_heart, more_abundantly we_were_earnest the face of_you_all to_see with great desire.
   18 Because we_wanted to_come to you_all, I indeed G‹Paulos›G, both once and twice, and hindered us G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G.
   19 For who is of_us the_hope or the_joy or the_crown of_boasting.
   Or not are even you_all, before the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous, at the of_him coming.
   20 For you_all are the glory of_us, and the_joy.
  Th-1 3  Therefore no_longer enduring, we_took_pleasure to_be_left in G‹Athēnai›G only, 2 and we_sent G‹Timotheos›G, the brother of_us, and servant of_god in the gospel of_the chosen_one/messiah, in_order that to_strengthen you_all and to_exhort, concerning the faith of_you_all, 3 that no_one to_be_being_disturbed by tribulations these.
   For yourselves you_all_have_known that for this we_are_appointing.
   4 For also when with you_all we_were, we_were_previously_saying to_you_all that we_are_going to_be_being_oppressed, as also it_became and you_all_have_known.
   5 Because_of this also_I no_longer enduring, I_sent in_order that to_know the faith of_you_all, lest somehow tempted you_all the one tempting, and in vain may_become the labor of_us.
   6 But now having_come G‹Timotheos›G to us from you_all, and having_gospel_preached to_us about_the faith and the love of_you_all, and that you_all_are_having a_mentioning of_us good always, longing us to_see, just_as also we you_all.
   7 Because_of this we_were_comforted, brothers, by you_all in all the distress and tribulation of_us, through the of_you_all faith.
   8 Because now we_are_living, if you_all are_standing_firm in the_master.
   9 For what thanksgiving we_are_being_able to_the to_god to_repay concerning you_all, for all the joy that we_are_rejoicing because_of you_all, before the god of_us.
   10 Night and day, beyond_exceedingly beseeching in_order that to_see of_you_all the face, and to_prepare the lacking things in_the_faith of_you_all.
   11 And himself the god and father of_us, and the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, might_direct the way of_us to you_all.
   12 And you_all the master might_abound and might_abound in_love toward one_another, and toward all, just_as also we toward you_all, 13 in_order that to_strengthen of_you_all the hearts, blameless in holiness before the god and father of_us, at the coming of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous, with all the holy ones of_him.
   Truly.
   Th-1 4  Therefore finally, brothers, we_are_asking you_all and we_are_exhorting in the the_master G‹H‹Yēsous, as you_all_received from us, how it_is_fitting you_all to_be_walking and to_be_bringing_pleasure to_god (as even you_all_are_walking), in_order_that you_all_may_be_abounding more.
   2 For you_all_have_known what_all charges we_gave to_you_all through the master G‹H‹Yēsous.
   3 For this is the_will of_god, the holiness of_you_all, to_be_keeping_away you_all from sexual_immorality, 4 to_have_known each of_you_all the of_himself vessel, to_be_acquiring in holiness and honor, 5 not in the_passion of_lust, just_as also the pagans not having_known god, 6 not to_be_going_beyond and to_be_exploiting in the matter the brother of_him, because avenging is the_master concerning all these things, as also we_previously_said to_you_all and we_testified.
   7 For not called us god to impurity, but in holiness.
   8 So_then the one rejecting this, not a_human is_rejecting, but god, the one giving the spirit of_him holy to you_all.
   9 And concerning brotherly_love, no need you_all_are_having for_me to_be_writing to_you_all, for yourselves you_all god-taught are, in_order that to_be_loving one_another.
   10 For also you_all_are_doing it toward all the brothers, who are in all G‹Makedonia›G.
   But we_are_exhorting you_all, brothers, to_be_abounding more, 11 and to_be_being_ambitious to_be_living_quietly and to_be_doing your own things, and to_be_working with_your own hands of_you_all, as to_you_all we_commanded, 12 in_order_that you_all_may_be_walking properly toward the ones outside, and of_nothing need you_all_may_be_having.
   13 Not but we_are_wanting you_all to_be_not_knowing, brothers, concerning the ones being_fallen_asleep, in_order_that not you_all _may_be_being_sorrowed, as also the rest, the ones not having hope.
   14 For if we_are_believing that G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G died_off and rose_up, thus also god the ones having_been_fallen_asleep through G‹H‹Yēsous will_be_bringing with him.
   15 For this to_you_all we_are_saying in the_word of_the_master, that we the ones living, being_remaining to the coming of_the master, by_no_means not may_precede the ones having_been_fallen_asleep.
   16 Because himself the master with a_loud_command, with the_voice of_an_archangel, and with the_trumpet of_god, will_be_coming_down from heaven, and the dead in chosen_one/messiah will_be_rising_up first, 17 then we the ones living, being_remaining together with them, will_be_being_snatched in the_clouds for the_meeting of_the master in the_air, and thus always with the_master we_will_be.
   18 So_then be_comforting one_another with words these.
  Th-1 5  And concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, no need you_all_are_having to_you_all to_be_being_written.
   2 For yourselves exactly you_all_have_known that the_day of_the_master, as a_thief by night thus is_coming.
   3 Whenever they_may_be_saying: Peace and security, then sudden is_recognizing to_them destruction, as the birth_pains to_the woman in pregnant having a_child, and by_no_means not they_may_escape.
   4 But you_all, brothers, not are in darkness, in_order_that the day you_all like thieves may_grasp.
   5 For all you_all sons of_light are, and sons of_day.
   Neither we_are of_night nor of_darkness.
   6 Therefore consequently not we_may_be_sleeping as the rest, but we_may_be_watching and we_may_be_being_sober.
   7 For the ones sleeping, by_night are_sleeping, and the ones being_drunk, by_night are_being_drunk.
   8 But we of_the_day being, may_be_being_sober, having_dressed_in the_breastplate of_faith and love, and the_helmet, the_hope of_salvation.
   9 Because not appointed god us for severe_anger, but for procuring of_salvation through the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous 10 the one having_died_off for us, in_order_that whether we_may_be_watching or we_may_be_sleeping, together with him we_may_live.
   11 Therefore be_comforting one_another, and be_building one one, as also you_all_are_doing.
   12 But we_are_asking you_all, brothers, to_have_known the ones laboring among you_all, and leading of_you_all in the_master, and admonishing you_all, 13 and to_be_considering them beyond_exceedingly in love, because_of the work of_them.
   Be_being_at_peace among yourselves.
   14 And we_are_exhorting you_all, brothers, be_admonishing the lazy, be_consoling the fainthearted, be_upholding of_the weak, be_being_patient toward all.
   15 Be_seeing not someone evil for evil to_anyone may_give_back, but always the good be_pursuing, and toward one_another and toward all.
   16 Always be_rejoicing.
   17 Unceasingly be_praying.
   18 In everything be_giving_thanks, for this is the_will of_god in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G toward you_all.
   19 The spirit not be_extinguishing.
   20 Prophesies not be_scorning.
   21 All things be_approving, the good be_keeping.
   22 From every appearance of_evil be_keeping_away.
   23 And himself god of_peace might_sanctify you_all complete, and complete of_you_all the spirit, and soul, and body, blamelessly at the coming of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, might_have_kept.
   24 Faithful is the one calling you_all, who also will_be_performing it.
   25 Brothers, be_praying also for us.
   26 Greet the brothers all with a_kiss holy.
   27 I_am_adjuring you_all by_the master, to_be_read my letter to_all the brothers.
   28 The grace of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, with you_all be.
   Truly.

2 G‹ones_from_Thessalonikē›G

1  G‹Paulos›G, and G‹Silouanos›G, and G‹Timotheos›G, to_the assembly of_the_G‹ones_from_Thessalonikē›G, in god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah: 2 grace be to_you_all and peace from god the_father of_us and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   3 To_be_giving_thanks we_ought to_god always concerning you_all, brothers, as worthy it_is, because is_growing_beyond the faith of_you_all, and is_abounding the love of_one each, of_all of_you_all, to one_another, 4 so_as ourselves us in you_all to_be_boasting, in the assemblies of_god, for the endurance of_you_all, and faith in all the persecutions of_you_all, and in_the tribulations that you_all_are_tolerating, 5 a_display of_the righteous judgment of_god, in_order that to_be_considered_worthy you_all of_the kingdom of_god, for which also you_all_are_suffering, 6 if_indeed righteous it_is with god, to_repay to_the ones oppressing you_all in_tribulation, 7 and to_you_all being_oppressed, relaxation with us at the revelation of_the master G‹H‹Yēsous from heaven, with angels of_power of_him, 8 in a_fire of_flame giving vengeance on_the ones not having_known god, and on_the ones not submitting to_the gospel of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous, chosen_one, 9 who justice will_be_paying with_destruction eternal, from the_presence of_the master, and from the glory of_the strength of_him, 10 whenever he_may_come to_be_glorified_in in the holy ones of_him, and to_be_Rx-marvelled-Rx among all the ones having_believed, because was_believed the testimony of_us to you_all in day that.
   11 For which also we_are_praying always for you_all, in_order_that you_all may_consider_worthy of_the calling the god of_us, and may_fulfill every good_pleasure of_goodness, and work of_faith with power, 12 so_that may_be_glorified_in the name of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous, in you_all, and you_all in him, according_to the grace of_the god of_us and of_the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
  Th-2 2  And we_are_asking you_all, brothers, concerning the coming of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, and of_us gathering_together to him, 2 in_order that not quickly to_be_shaken you_all in mind, nor you_all_are_being_alarmed, neither by spirit, nor by word, nor by letter, as_though by us, as that has_presented the day of_the master.
   3 Not someone you_all may_deceive in not_one manner, because if not may_come the apostasy first, and may_be_revealed the man of_lawlessness, the son of_destruction, 4 the one opposing and exalting himself over every being_called a_god or object_of_worship, so_as him in the temple of_god to_sit_down, demonstrating himself that he_is god.
   5 Not you_all_are_remembering that still being with you_all, these things I_was_saying to_you_all.
   6 And now the thing restraining you_all_have_known, in_order that to_be_revealed him in the of_him time.
   7 For the mystery already is_working of_lawlessness, only the one restraining it now there_is, until out_of the_midst it_may_become.
   8 And then will_be_being_revealed the lawless one, whom the master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G will_be_killing with_the spirit of_the mouth of_him, and will_be_nullifying by_the appearing of_the coming of_him, 9 of_whom is coming, according_to the_working of_G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G in every power, and signs, and wonders of_falsehood, 10 and in every seduction of_unrighteousness, in_the ones perishing, for which the love of_the truth not they_received, in_order that to_be_saved them.
   11 And because_of this, is_sending to_them god a_working of_deception, in_order that to_believe them in_the falsehood, 12 in_order_that may_be_judged all the ones not having_believed in_the truth, but having_taken_pleasure in_unrighteousness.
   13 But we ought to_be_giving_thanks to_god always concerning you_all, brothers having_been_loved by the the_master, that chose you_all god, from the_beginning to salvation in the_holiness of_the_spirit and faith of_the_truth, 14 to which he_called us, through the gospel of_us, to the_procuring of_the_glory of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah.
   15 Therefore consequently, brothers, be_standing_firm and be_taking_hold_of the traditions that you_all_were_taught, whether by word, or by letter from_us.
   16 And himself the master of_us, chosen_one, G‹H‹Yēsous, and god the father of_us, the one having_loved us and having_given comfort eternal, and hope good by grace, 17 might_comfort the hearts, of_you_all and might_strengthen you_all in every work and word good.
  Th-2 3  For_the rest, be_praying, brothers, for us, in_order_that the word of_the master may_be_spreading and may_be_being_glorified, as also with you_all, 2 and in_order_that we_may_be_rescued from perverse and evil people, for not is of_all are the faith.
   3 But faithful is the master, who will_be_strengthening you_all, and will_be_keeping you_all from the evil one.
   4 And we_have_persuaded in the_master to you_all that the things we_are_commanding, you_all_are_doing and will_be_doing.
   5 And the master might_direct of_you_all the hearts into the love of_god, and into the endurance of_the chosen_one.
   6 And we_are_commanding to_you_all, brothers, in the_name of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one, to_be_avoiding you_all from every brother lazily walking, and not according_to the tradition which they_received from us.
   7 For yourselves you_all_have_known how it_is_fitting to_be_imitating us, because not we_loafed among you_all, 8 nor undeservedly bread we_ate from anyone, but in labor and hardship, night and day working, in_order that not to_burden anyone of_you_all.
   9 Not that not we_are_having the_right, but in_order_that ourselves an_example we_may_give to_you_all, in_order that to_be_imitating us.
   10 For even when we_were with you_all, this we_were_commanding to_you_all, that if anyone not is_willing to_be_working, not him _let_be_eating.
   11 For we_are_hearing some are walking among you_all lazily, nothing working, but meddling.
   12 And to_such we_are_commanding and are_exhorting by the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, that with quietness working of_themselves bread they_may_be_eating.
   13 But you_all, brothers, not may_lose_heart doing_good.
   14 And if anyone not is_submitting to_the word of_us through letter, this man be_taking_note, not to_be_associating_with with_him, in_order_that he_may_be_swayed.
   15 And_yet not as an_enemy be_considering him, but be_admonishing him as a_brother.
   16 And himself the master of_peace, might_give to_you_all peace through all time in every manner.
   The master be with all of_you_all.
   17 The greeting in_my own hand, of_G‹Paulos›G, which is my_sign in every letter, thus I_am_writing.
   18 The grace of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, with all of_you_all.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50

The source table used to create this file is Copyright © 2022 by https://GreekCNTR.org

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

1 G‹Timotheos›G

1  G‹Paulos›G, an_ambassador of_chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, according_to the_command of_god the_Rx-saviour-Rx of_us, and the_master G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one the hope of_us, 2 to_G‹Timotheos›G, genuine child in the_faith: grace, mercy, peace from god the_father and chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous the master of_us.
   3 As I_implored you to_remain in G‹Efesos›G, going to G‹Makedonia›G, in_order_that you_may_command to_some not to_be_teaching_differently, 4 nor to_be_giving_heed to_myths and genealogies endless, which speculations are_bringing_about rather than management of_god, which is in faith.
   5 And the outcome of_our charge is love out_of a_pure heart, and a_conscience good, and a_faith unhypocritical, 6 from_which some having_deviated, were_turned_away to useless_talk, 7 wanting to_be law_teachers, not understanding neither what they_are_saying, nor about what_all they_are_confirming.
   8 But we_have_known that good is the law, if someone to_it lawfully may_be_resorting, 9 having_known this, that for_the_righteous the_law not is_appointing, but for_the_lawless and insubordinate, the_ungodly and the_sinners, unholy and profane, father_killers and mother_killers, murderers, 10 the_sexually_immoral, homosexuals, kidnapers, liars, perjurers, and if any other thing to_the being_sound teaching is_opposing, 11 according_to the gospel of_the glory of_the blessed god, which was_entrusted I.
   12 Thankfulness I_am_having for_the one having_strengthened me, chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous the master of_us, because faithful me he_considered, having_appointed me to service, 13 earlier being a_slanderous, and a_persecutor, and an_abuser, but I_was_shown_mercy, because not_knowing, I_did it in unbelief.
   14 And over_abounded the grace of_the master of_us, with faith and love in chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous.
   15 Trustworthy is the saying, and of_all acceptance worthy: chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous came into the world sinners to_save, of_whom the_first am I.
   16 But because_of this I_was_shown_mercy, in_order_that in me first may_display G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one his all patience, for a_pattern of_the ones going to_be_believing in him, to life eternal.
   17 And to_the king of_the ages, the_indestructible, invisible, only god, honor and glory be, to the ages of_the ages.
   Truly.
   18 This charge I_am_entrusting to_you, child, G‹Timotheos›G, according_to the going_before to you prophesies, that you_may_be_warring by them the good warfare, 19 holding faith and a_good conscience, which some having_pushed_away, concerning their faith they_suffered_shipwreck, 20 of_whom is G‹Humenaios›G and G‹Alexandros›G, whom I_gave_over to_G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G, in_order_that they_may_be_disciplined not to_be_slandering.
  Ti-1 2  Therefore I_am_exhorting, first of_all to_be_being_made petitions, prayers, petitions, thanksgivings, for all people, 2 for kings and all who in prominence being, in_order_that a_tranquil and quiet living we_may_be_going_by in all devoutness and dignity.
   3 This is good and acceptable before the Rx-saviour-Rx of_us, god, 4 who all people is_wanting to_be_saved, and to the_knowledge of_the_truth to_come.
   5 For one Rx-one-Rx, god there_is also mediator ˱between˲_god and humans, the_human chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, 6 the one having_given himself a_ransom for all, and testimony in_seasons its_own, 7 to which was_appointed I a_proclaimer and an_ambassador (the_truth I_am_speaking in chosen_one, not I_am_lying), a_teacher of_the_pagans in knowledge and truth.
   8 Therefore I_am_wishing, to_be_praying men in every place, lifted_up devout hands apart_from severe_anger and speculation.
   9 Likewise women in apparel respectable with modesty and sobriety to_be_adorning themselves, not with braids, and gold, or pearls, or clothing expensive, 10 but what is_befitting to_women professing the_god-fearing, through works good.
   11 A_woman in quietness let_be_learning in all submission.
   12 But to_be_teaching by_a_women not I_am_permitting, nor to_be_domineering of_a_man, but to_be in quietness.
   13 For G‹H‹Adam/('Ādām)›H›G first was_formed, thereafter Rx-G‹H‹Eua/(Ḩavvāh)›H›G-Rx, 14 and G‹H‹Adam not was_seduced, but the woman having_been_deceived, in transgression has_become.
   15 But she_will_be_being_saved through childbearing, if they_may_remain in faith, and love, and holiness, with sobriety.
  Ti-1 3  Trustworthy is the saying: if anyone to_overseeing is_aspiring, of_a_good work he_is_desiring.
   2 Therefore it_is_fitting the overseer irreproachable to_be, of_one wife the_husband, sober, sensible, respectable, hospitable, teaching, 3 not winebibbing, nor a_bully, but gentle, peaceable, ungreedy, 4 of_his own house well leading, children having in submission, with all dignity 5 (but if someone of_his own house to_lead not has_known, how of_the_assembly of_god he_will_be_taking_care.
   ) 6 Not a_neophyte, in_order_that not having_been_conceited, into the_judgment he_may_fall_in of_the devil.
   7 And it_is_fitting him also, a_testimony good to_be_having from the ones outside, in_order_that not into derision he_may_fall_in, and the_snare of_the devil.
   8 Servants likewise should_be dignified, not double-tongued, not to_wine much addicted, not greedy, 9 holding the mystery of_the faith in clean a_conscience.
   10 Also and these let_be_being_approved first, thereafter them _let_be_serving, unindictable being.
   11 /Their/_wives likewise should_be dignified, not diabolical, sober, faithful in all things.
   12 Of_one servants them_let_be wife husbands, of_their_children well leading and of_their own households.
   13 For the ones well having_served, a_standing for_themselves good are_procuring, and great confidence in the_faith in chosen_one/messiah G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G.
   14 These things to_you I_am_writing, hoping to_come to you in quickness, 15 but if I_may_be_slowing, in_order_that you_may_have_known how it_is_fitting in the_household of_god to_be_being_conducted, which is the_assembly of_god the_living, the_pillar and foundation of_the truth.
   16 And confessedly great is the of_devoutness mystery: who was_revealed in the_flesh, was_justified in the_spirit, was_seen by_angels, was_proclaimed among the_nations, was_believed in the_world, was_taken_up in glory.
  Ti-1 4  But the spirit expressly is_speaking that in later times, will_be_withdrawing some from_the faith, giving_heed to_spirits deceitful and teachings of_demons, 2 in hypocrisy of_liars, having_been_seared their own conscience, 3 forbidding to_be_marrying, to_be_keeping_away from_foods that god created for partaking with thanksgiving, by_the faithful ones and having_known the truth.
   4 Because every creature of_god is good, and nothing rejected is with thanksgiving being_received, 5 for it_is_being_sanctified by the_word of_god and petition.
   6 These things laying_down to_the brothers, good you_will_be a_servant of_chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous, being_nourished in_the words of_the faith, and of_the good teaching with_which you_have_followed.
   7 But the profane and granny myths be_refusing.
   And be_training yourself to devoutness, 8 for bodily training for a_little is beneficial, but the devoutness for all things beneficial is, the_promise holding of_the_life present, and of_the life coming.
   9 Trustworthy is the saying, and of_all acceptance worthy.
   10 For for this we_are_laboring and we_are_striving, because we_have_hoped in a_god living, who is the_Rx-saviour-Rx of_all people, most_of_all of_believers.
   11 Be_commanding these things and be_teaching.
   12 No_one of_you the youth let_be_despising, but an_example be_becoming for_the believing ones, in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith, in purity.
   13 Until I_am_coming, be_giving_heed to_the public_reading, to_exhortation, to_teaching.
   14 Not be_neglecting of_the in you gift, which was_given to_you through prophecy, with the_laying_on of_the hands of_the council_of_elders.
   15 These things be_pondering, in these things be, in_order_that of_you the progress manifest may_be to_all.
   16 Be_holding_on to_yourself and to_the teaching.
   Be_continuing_on in_them, for this doing, both yourself you_will_be_saving and the ones hearing from_you.
  Ti-1 5  To_an_elder not you_may_harshly_give_rebuke, but be_exhorting him as a_father, younger men as brothers, 2 eldresses as mothers, younger as sisters, in all purity.
   3 Widows be_honoring, who are really widows.
   4 But if any widow, children or grandchildren is_having, them _let_be_learning first to_their own household to_be_devout, and recompense to_be_giving_back to_the parents, for this is acceptable before god.
   5 And the woman really a_widow and having_been_left_alone, has_hoped in god, and is_remaining in_petitions and prayers, night and day.
   6 But the woman living_luxuriously, ˱while˲_living has_died.
   7 Also these things be_commanding, in_order_that irreproachable they_may_be.
   8 But if anyone of_their own and most_of_all household not is_providing, the faith he_has_disowned, and is an_unbeliever worse than.
   9 A_widow let_be_being_enrolled not lessor than sixty years having_become, of_one husband the_wife, 10 in works good being_attested: if she_raised_children, if she_lodged_strangers, if of_holy ones the_feet she_washed, if being_oppressed ones she_assisted, if to_every work good she_followed_after.
   11 But younger widows be_refusing, for whenever they_may_become_sensual against_the chosen_one/messiah, to_be_marrying they_are_willing, 12 having judgment because their first faith they_rejecting.
   13 But together also idle they_are_learning to_be, going_around houses, not and only idle, but also gossips and meddling, speaking the things not fitting.
   14 Therefore I_am_wishing the_younger women to_be_marrying, to_be_bearing_children, to_be_keeping_house, not_one opportunity to_be_giving to_the one opposing of_insult for_reason_of.
   15 For already some were_turned_away after G‹H‹Satan/(Sāţān)›H›G.
   16 If any believing woman is_having widows, he _let_be_assisting to_them, and not let_be_being_weighed_down the assembly, in_order_that to_the really widows it_may_assist.
   17 The well having_led elders, of_double honor let_be_being_considered_worthy, most_of_all the ones laboring in the_word and the_teaching.
   18 For is_saying the scripture, not you_will_be_muzzling, ox threshing, and: worthy is the worker of_the wage of_him.
   19 Against an_elder accusation not be_accepting, besides except on two or three witnesses.
   20 The ones sinning before, all be_rebuking, in_order_that also the rest fear may_be_having.
   21 I_am_testifying before god, and chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, and the chosen angels, in_order_that these things you_may_keep apart_from prejudice, nothing doing according_to partiality.
   22 Hands quickly on_no_one be_laying_on, nor be_sharing in_the_sins another's, yourself pure be_keeping.
   23 No_longer be_drinking_water only, but with_wine a_little be_giving_treatment, because_of your stomach and the frequent of_you sicknesses.
   24 Of_some people the sins quite_evident are, going_before them to judgment, but to_some also they_are_following_after.
   25 Likewise also the works good quite_evident are, and the ones otherwise being, to_be_hidden not are_being_able.
  Ti-1 6  As_many_as are under a_yoke slaves, their own masters of_all honor worthy them _let_be_considering, in_order_that not the name of_god and the teaching may_be_being_slandered.
   2 And the ones believing having masters, not them _let_be_despising, because brothers they_are, but rather them _let_be_serving, because believing they_are and beloved, who are from_their good_work benefitting.
   These things be_teaching and be_exhorting.
   3 If anyone is_teaching_differently, and not is_approaching to_being_sound in_the_words, of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, and in_the according_to devoutness teaching, 4 he_has_been_conceited nothing knowing, but obsessing about debates and quibbles_about_words, out_of which is_becoming envy, strife, slander, suspicions evil, 5 constant_frictions, having_been_ruined of_people the mind and having_been_defrauded of_the truth, thinking a_means_of_gain to_be devoutness.
   6 But it_is a_means_of_gain great the devoutness with contentment.
   7 For nothing we_carried_in into the world, because neither to_bring_out anything we_are_being_able.
   8 And having sustenance and shelters, with_these we_will_be_being_sufficed.
   9 But the ones wishing to_be_being_rich, are_falling_in into temptation, and a_snare, and desires many foolish and harmful, which are_sinking people into destruction and destruction.
   10 For a_root of_all evil is the fondness_of_silver, of_which some aspiring, have_wandered_away from the faith, and themselves pierced with_sorrows many.
   11 But you, Rx-Oh-Rx person of_god, these things be_fleeing, but be_pursuing righteousness, devoutness, faith, love, endurance, gentleness.
   12 Be_fighting the good fight of_the faith, take_hold of_the eternal life, to which you_were_called and you_confessed the good confession before many witnesses.
   13 I_am_commanding to_you before god, the one giving_life_to the things all, and chosen_one G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G, the one having_testified before G‹Pontios›G Rx-G‹Pilatos›G-Rx the good confession, 14 to_keep you the commandment spotless irreproachable, until the appearing of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, 15 which in_seasons his_own will_be_showing the blessed and only Sovereign, the king of_the ones reigning, and the_master of_the ones mastering, 16 the only one having immortality, in_light dwelling unapproachable, whom saw not_one of_the_people, nor to_see is_able, to_whom be honor and dominion eternal.
   Truly.
   17 To_the rich in the present age, be_commanding not to_be_highfaluting, nor to_have_hoped in of_riches the_uncertainty, but in god, bringing_about us all things richly for enjoyment, 18 to_be_working_good, to_be_being_rich in works good, well_imparting to_be, generous, 19 storing_away for_themselves a_foundation good for the time coming, in_order_that they_may_take_hold of_the really life.
   20 Rx-Oh-Rx G‹Timotheos›G, the deposit guard, turning_away the profane empty_babblings and oppositions of_the falsely_called knowledge, 21 which some professing concerning the faith deviated.
   grace be with you_all.
