USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

G‹H‹Yakōbos

1  G‹H‹Yakōbos/(Ya'aqov)›H›G, of_god and of_the_master G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, twelve, a_slave to_the tribes which are in the dispersion: to_be_greeting.
   2 All joy consider it, brothers of_me, whenever trials you_all_may_fall_among various, 3 knowing that the proving of_you_all the faith is_producing endurance.
   4 And endurance work its_perfect let_be_having, in_order_that you_all_may_be perfect and complete, in nothing lacking.
   5 But if anyone of_you_all is_lacking of_wisdom, him _let_be_requesting from the one giving, god, to_all generously, and not deriding, and it_will_be_being_given to_him.
   6 But him _let_be_requesting in faith, nothing doubting, for the one doubting is_like to_a_wave of_the_sea, being_blown and being_tossed.
   7 For not let_be_supposing person that that he_will_be_receiving anything from the master, 8 a_man double-minded, disturbance in all the ways of_him.
   9 And let_be_boasting the brother humble, in the height of_him, 10 and the rich, in the humiliation of_him, because like a_flower of_the_grass he_will_be_passing_away.
   11 For rose the sun with its scorching_heat, and withered the grass, and the flower of_it fell_from, and the beauty of_the appearance of_it perished.
   Thus also the rich man among the pursuits of_him will_be_being_faded_away.
   12 Blessed is the_man who is_enduring trial, because approved having_become, he_will_be_receiving the crown of_life, that he_promised to_the ones loving him.
   13 No_one being_tempted let_be_saying, By god I_am_being_tempted.
   For god untemptable is by_evil, and is_tempting he no_one.
   14 But each is_being_tempted by his own lust, being_drawn_away and being_enticed.
   15 Thereafter the desire having_conceived is_bearing sin, and sin having_been_finished_out, is_bringing_forth death.
   16 Not be_being_misled, brothers of_me beloved.
   17 Every giving good, and every gift perfect from_above is, coming_down from the father of_lights, with whom not there_is variation or of_shifting of_shadow.
   18 Having_been_wished it, he_brought_forth us by_the_word of_truth, in_order that to_be us first-fruit a_certain of_the of_him creatures.
   19 Be_having/_known, brothers of_me beloved.
   But let_be every person quick in_order that to_hear, slow in_order that to_speak, slow to anger, 20 for the_severe_anger of_a_human, the_righteousness of_god not is_producing.
   21 Therefore having_put_away all filthiness and abundance of_evil, in gentleness receive the implanted word, the one being_able to_save the souls of_you_all.
   22 And be_becoming doers of_the_word, and not only listeners deluding yourselves.
   23 Because if anyone a_listener of_the_word is, and not a_doer, this one is_like to_man observing his face of_existence of_him in a_mirror.
   24 For he_observed himself and has_gone_away, and immediately he_forgot what_kind he_was.
   25 But the one having_investigated into the_law perfect, the law of_freedom, and having_continued_with it, not a_listener of_forgetful having_become, but a_doer of_the_work, this one blessed in the doing of_him will_be.
   26 If anyone is_supposing religious to_be, not bridling the_tongue of_himself, but seducing the_heart of_him, of_this one useless is his religion.
   27 Religion pure and undefiled before our god and father this is: to_be_visiting orphans and widows in the tribulation of_them, spotless himself to_be_keeping from the world.
  Jam 2  Brothers of_me, not with favouritism be_holding the faith of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, of_glory.
   2 For if may_come_in into the_synagogue of_you_all, a_man gold_ring, in clothing splendid, and may_come_in also a_poor man, in filthy clothing, 3 and you_all_may_look_at on the one wearing the clothing splendid, and you_all_may_say: You be_sitting here good, and to_the poor you_all_may_say: You stand there, or: Be_sitting under the footstool of_me, 4 not you_all_were_distinguished among yourselves, and became judges with_speculations evil.
   5 Hear, brothers of_me beloved: not god chose the poor in_the world, rich in faith to_be, and heirs of_the kingdom which he_promised to_the ones loving him.
   6 But you_all dishonored the poor.
   Not the rich are_oppressing over_you_all, and they are_dragging you_all into courts.
   7 Not they are_slandering the good name having_been_called on you_all.
   8 If however the_law you_all_are_accomplishing royal, according_to the scripture: you_will_be_loving the neighbor of_you as yourself, well you_all_are_doing.
   9 But if you_all_are_showing_favouritism, sin you_all_are_doing, being_rebuked by the law as transgressors.
   10 For whoever all the law may_keep, but may_stumble in one thing, has_become of_all liable.
   11 For the one having_said: not you_may_commit_adultery, said also: not you_may_murder.
   And if not you_are_committing_adultery, but you_are_murdering you_have_become a_transgressor of_the_law.
   12 Thus be_speaking, and thus be_doing, as by the_law of_freedom going to_be_being_judged.
   13 For the judgment merciless will_be to_the one not having_doing mercy.
   Is_triumphing mercy over_judgment.
   14 What is profit, brothers of_me, if faith may_be_saying anyone, to_be_having but, works not may_be_having.
   Not is_able the faith to_save him.
   15 If a_brother or a_sister naked may_be_being, and lacking of_daily food, 16 and may_say anyone to_them from you_all: Be_going in peace, be_warming and be_satisfying, not but you_all_may_give to_them the necessary things for_their body, what is profit.
   17 Thus also faith, if not it_may_be_having works, dead it_is by itself.
   18 But will_be_saying someone: You faith are_having, and_I works am_having.
   Show to_me the faith of_you without the works, and_I to_you will_be_showing by the works of_me faith.
   19 You are_believing that one is god.
   Well you_are_doing, even the demons are_believing and are_shuddering.
   20 But you_are_wanting to_know, Rx-Oh-Rx person vain, that faith apart_from works idle is.
   21 G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G the father of_us not by works was_justified, having_offered_up G‹H‹Isa'ak/(Yiʦəḩāq)›H›G the son of_him on the altar.
   22 You_are_seeing that his faith was_working_together with_the works of_him, and by his works his faith was_perfected.
   23 And was_fulfilled the scripture saying: and believed G‹H‹Abra'am in_ god, and it_was_reckoned to_him for righteousness, and a_friend of_god he_was_called.
   24 it_is_being_seen that by works is_being_justified a_person, and not by faith only.
   25 And likewise also G‹H‹Ɽaⱪab/(Rāḩāv)›H›G the prostitute not by works was_justified, having_welcomed the messengers and by_another way having_sent_forth.
   26 For as the body apart_from spirit dead is, thus also faith apart_from works dead is.
  Jam 3  Not many teachers be_becoming, brothers of_me, having_known that greater judgment we_will_be_receiving.
   2 For in_many ways we_are_stumbling all.
   If anyone in his_word not is_stumbling, this a_perfect man is, powerful to_bridle also all his body.
   3 And, if of_the horses bridles into the mouths we_are_putting, in_order that to_be_being_persuaded them to_us, also all the body of_them we_are_directing.
   4 See also the ships, so_great being, and by winds hard being_driven, is_being_directed by the_least rudder, wherever the impulse of_the one straightening is_wishing.
   5 Thus also the tongue a_small member is, and great things is_boasting.
   See how_much fire, how_much a_forest is_kindling.
   6 And the tongue is a_fire, the world of_unrighteousness, the tongue is_being_set_down among the members of_us, staining all the body, and setting_on_fire the course of_existence, and being_set_on_fire by G‹geenna›G.
   7 For every nature of_wild_beasts both and of_birds, of_reptiles both and of_sea creatures, is_being_tamed and has_been_tamed by_the nature human, 8 but the tongue no_one to_tame is_able of_the_people, an_unstable evil, full of_poison deadly.
   9 In it we_are_blessing our master and father, and in it we_are_cursing people, the ones according_to the_likeness of_god having_become.
   10 Out_of the same mouth is_coming_out blessing and curse.
   Not is_ought brothers of_me these things thus to_be_becoming.
   11 Surely_not the spring out_of of_the same hole is_outflowing sweet and bitter.
   12 Not is_able, brothers of_me, a_fig_tree olives to_produce or a_vine figs.
   Nor salt sweet to_produce water.
   13 Who is wise and understanding among you_all.
   ˱Him˲_let_show out_of his good conduct the works of_him in the_gentleness of_wisdom.
   14 But if jealousy bitter you_all_are_having, and selfish_ambition in the heart of_you_all, not be_boasting and be_lying against the truth.
   15 Not is this the wisdom from_above coming_down, but earthly, soulish, demonic.
   16 For where jealousy and selfish_ambition is, there is disturbance and every evil matter.
   17 But the from_above wisdom, first indeed pure is, then peaceable, gentle, compliant, full of_mercy and of_fruits good, unceasing, unhypocritical.
   18 And the_fruit of_righteousness in peace is_being_sown, by_the ones making peace.
  Jam 4  From_where wars and from_where quarrels among you_all are.
   Not is_it from_here from the gratifications of_you_all, warring in the members of_you_all.
   2 You_all_are_desiring and not you_all_are_having, you_all_are_murdering and are_being_jealous, and not you_all_are_being_able to_obtain, you_all_are_quarrelling and you_all_are_warring.
   Not you_all_are_having, because_of that not to_be_requesting you_all, 3 you_are_requesting and not you_all_are_receiving, because wrongly you_all_are_requesting, in_order_that in the gratifications of_you_all you_all_may_spend it.
   4 Adultresses.
   Not you_all_have_known that friendship with_the world, enmity of_god is.
   Whoever therefore may_be_wished a_friend to_be of_the world, an_enemy of_god is_being_appointed.
   5 Or you_all_are_supposing that emptily the scripture is_saying: with envy is_longing_for the spirit which is made_to_dwell in us.
   6 But greater he_is_giving grace.
   Therefore he_is_saying: god against_the_proud is_opposing, but to_the_humble he_is_giving grace.
   7 Therefore be_subjected to_god.
   But resist against_the devil, and he_will_be_fleeing from you_all.
   8 Near to_god, and he_will_be_nearing to_you_all.
   Cleanse your_hands, sinners, and purify your_hearts, double-minded.
   9 Be_miserable, and mourn, weep.
   The laughter of_you_all to mourning let_be_turned, and your joy to gloominess.
   10 Be_humbled before the_master, and he_will_be_exalting you_all.
   11 Not be_slandering against_one_another, brothers.
   The one slandering against_his_brother or judging the brother of_him, is_slandering against_the_law and is_judging the_law.
   But if the_law you_are_judging, not you_are a_doer of_the_law, but a_judge.
   12 Rx-one-Rx there_is lawgiver and judge, the one being_able to_save and to_destroy.
   But you who are, the one judging your neighbor.
   13 Be_come now, you_all saying: Today or tomorrow, we_will_be_going into this city, and we_will_be_working there a_year, and we_will_be_merchandising, and we_will_be_profiting.
   14 Who not are_knowing on_the day next will_be, for what is life of_you_all.
   For a_vapor you_all_are, for a_little time appearing, then also being_perishing.
   15 Instead_of that to_be_saying you_all ought: If the master may_will, both we_will_be_living and we_will_be_doing, this or that.
   16 But now you_all_are_boasting in the arrogance of_you_all.
   All boasting such evil is.
   17 Therefore to_having_known one good to_be_doing, and not doing it, sin to_him it_is.
  Jam 5  Be_come now, you rich ones, weep, wailing over the miseries of_you_all which are coming_over.
   2 The riches of_you_all has_rotted, and the clothes of_you_all moth-eaten has_become.
   3 The gold of_you_all and the silver has_been_corroded, and the rust of_them for a_testimony to_you_all will_be, and will_be_consuming the fleshes of_you_all like fire.
   You_all_stored_up in the_last days.
   4 See the wage of_the workers, having_harvested the fields of_you_all, having_been_withheld by you_all, is_crying_out, and the outcries of_the ones having_reaped, into the ears of_the_master of_armies have_come_in.
   5 You_all_indulged on the earth.
   And you_all_lived_luxuriously, you_all_nourished the hearts of_you_all in the_day of_slaughter.
   6 You_all_convicted, you_all_murdered the righteous, ˱yet˲_not he_is_opposing against_you_all.
   7 Therefore be_patient, brothers, until the coming of_the master.
   See the farmer is_awaiting for_the precious fruit of_the earth, being_patient for it until he_may_receive the_early and late rains.
   8 Be_patient also you_all, strengthen the hearts of_you_all, because the coming of_the master has_neared.
   9 Not be_groaning, brothers, against one_another, in_order_that not you_all_may_be_judged.
   See the judge before the doors has_stood.
   10 An_example take, brothers, of_misfortune, and of_patience, the prophets, who spoke in name of_the_master.
   11 See we_are_counting_blessed the ones having_endured.
   The endurance of_G‹H‹Iōb/('Iuōv)›H›G you_all_heard, and the outcome of_the_master you_all_saw, that much_compassionate is the master and compassionate.
   12 Before but, all things, brothers of_me, not be_swearing, neither by_heaven, nor the earth, nor other any oath, but let_be of_you_all your Yes be, yes, and your No be, no, in_order_that not under judgment you_all_may_fall.
   13 Is_suffering_hardship anyone among you_all.
   ˱Him˲ _let_be_praying.
   Is_cheering_up anyone.
   ˱Him˲ _let_be_singing_praises.
   14 Is_ailing anyone among you_all.
   ˱Him˲_let_call_to the elders of_the assembly, and them_let_pray over him, having_anointed him with_olive_oil in the name of_the master.
   15 And the vow of_faith will_be_saving the one faltering, and will_be_raising him the master, and_if sins he_may_be having_done, it_will_be_being_forgiven to_him.
   16 Therefore be_confessing to_one_another your sins, and be_praying for one_another, so_that you_all_may_be_healed.
   Much is_prevailing the_petition of_a_righteous one working.
   17 G‹H‹Ēlias/('Ēliyyāh)›H›G a_man was like_natured to_us, and with_prayer he_prayed not for_it to_rain, and not it_rained on the earth, three years and six months.
   18 And again he_prayed, and the sky rain gave, and the earth sprouted the fruit of_it.
   19 Brothers of_me, if anyone among you_all may_be_strayed from the truth, and may_turn_back someone him, 20 be_knowing that the one having_turned_back a_sinner from the_deception of_the_way of_him, will_be_saving the_soul of_him from death, and will_be_covering a_multitude of_sins.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50

The source table used to create this file is Copyright © 2022 by https://GreekCNTR.org

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

1 G‹Petros›G

1  G‹Petros›G, an_ambassador of_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, to_the_chosen aliens of_the_dispersion of_Rx-G‹Pontos›G-Rx, Rx-G‹Galatia›G-Rx, G‹Kappadokia›G, G‹Asia›G, and G‹Bithunia›G, 2 according_to the_foreknowledge of_god the_father by the_holiness of_the_spirit, to the_obedience and sprinkling of_the_blood of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one: grace to_you_all and might_have_multiplied peace.
   3 Blessed is the god and father of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, who according_to the great mercy of_him, having_born_again us to a_ living _hope, through the_resurrection of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one from the_dead, 4 to an_ indestructible _inheritance, and undefiled, and unfading, having_been_kept in the_heavens for you_all, 5 who by the_power of_god being_guarded through faith, for the_salvation ready to_be_revealed in the_ last _time.
   6 In which you_all_are_exulting a_little now, if fitting having_been_sorrowed by various trials, 7 in_order_that the proving the faith of_you_all more_preciously than gold which is perishing, by but fire being_approved, may_be_found to praise, and glory, and honor, in the_revelation of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   8 Whom you_all_are_loving not having_seen, in whom now not seeing but believing, you_all_are_exulting with_joy inexpressible and having_been_glorified, 9 receiving_back the outcome of_the faith of_you_all, the_salvation of_souls.
   10 Concerning which salvation, the_prophets sought_out and searched_out, having_prophesied for the grace toward you_all, 11 searching into who or what time the spirit of_chosen_one in them was_making_evident, previously_testifying the sufferings for the_chosen_one, and the after these things glories.
   12 To_whom it_was_revealed that they_were_ not _serving unto_themselves, but unto_you_all the_same things, which now was_declared to_you_all, by the ones having_gospel_preached to_you_all by_the_ holy _spirit, having_been_sent_out from heaven, into which things angels are_desiring to_investigate.
   13 Therefore having_girded_up the loins of_the mind of_you_all, being_sober, completely hope on the grace being_brought to_you_all at the_revelation of_G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   14 As children of_obedience, not conforming to_the earlier desires in the ignorance of_you_all, 15 but as the one having_called you_all holy, also let_ yourselves _become holy in all conduct, 16 because it_has_been_written, you_all_will_be: holy, because I am holy.
   17 And if you_all_are_calling_on the_father, the one impartially judging according_to the work of_each one, be_conducted in fear the of_the sojourn time of_you_all, 18 having_known that you_all_were_redeemed not by_perishable things, by_silver or by_gold, from the useless conduct of_you_all inherited_from_forefathers, 19 but by_the_precious blood, of_chosen_one/messiah as of_a_lamb unblemished and spotless, 20 having_been_foreknown on_one_hand before the_foundation of_the_world, on_the_other_hand having_been_revealed in the_last times because_of you_all, 21 who by him believing in god, the one having_raised him from the_dead, and having_given glory to_him, so_as the faith and hope of_you_all, to_be in god.
   22 Having_purified the souls of_you_all by obedience to_the truth in unhypocritical brotherly_love earnestly love one_another out_of heart.
   23 Having_been_born_again, not of perishable but of_indestructible corruption by the_ living and remaining _word of_god.
   24 Because: all flesh is like grass, and all the_glory of_it like the_flower of_grass.
   The Grass was_withered, and the flower fell_from, 25 but the the_word of_the_master is_remaining to the age.
   And this is the word having_been_gospel_preached to you_all.
  Pe-1 2  Therefore having_put_away all malice, and all deceit, and hypocrisies, and envies, and all slanders, 2 like newborn babies long the logical unadulterated milk, in_order_that by it you_all_may_be_grown for salvation, 3 if you_all_tasted that the master is good.
   4 To whom approaching a_ living _stone, on_one_hand having_been_rejected by humans, on_the_other_hand chosen by god, honored, 5 also yourselves as living stones you_all_are_being_built, a_ spiritual _house, into a_ holy _priesthood to_offer_up spiritual sacrifices acceptable to_god through G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one.
   6 Because it_is_contained in in_scripture: see, I_am_laying a_stone in G‹H‹Siōn/(Tsiuōn)›H›G, a_cornerstone chosen honored, and the one believing in him, by_no_means may_ not _be_disgraced.
   7 Therefore is the value to_you_all, the ones believing, but to_disbelieving ones the_stone which the ones building rejected, this was_become to the_head of_the_corner, 8 and: a_stone of_stumbling, and a_rock of_offense, who are_stumbling disbelieving in_the word, to which also they_were_appointed.
   9 But you_all are a_ chosen _race: a_royal priesthood, a_ holy _nation, a_people for his_procuring, so_that the virtues you_all_may_proclaim_out, of_the one having_called you_all out_of darkness, to the Rx-marvellous-Rx light of_him, 10 who once were not a_people, but now are the_people of_god, the ones not having_been_shown_mercy, and now having_been_shown_mercy.
   11 Beloved, I_am_exhorting as sojourners and aliens, to_be_keeping_away from_the fleshly desires, which are_warring against your soul, 12 having the good conduct of_you_all among the pagans, in_order_that at which they_are_slandering against_you_all as of_evildoers, by observing your good works, they_may_glorify god in the_day of_visitation.
   13 Be_subjected to_every human creation because_of the master, whether to_the_king as being_above, 14 or to_governors as being_sent by him, for vengeance to_evildoers, but praise to_welldoers.
   15 Because thus is the will of_god, doing_good to_be_silencing the ignorance of_foolish people.
  , 16 as free live, and not having the freedom as a_cover-up of_the evil, but as slaves of_god.
   17 Honor all, be_loving the brotherhood, be_revering god, be_honoring the king.
   18 house_servants, being_subjected with all respect to_your masters, not only to_the good and gentle, but also to_the crooked.
   19 For this a_favour is, if because_of conscience of_god, anyone is_bearing_under sorrows suffering unjustly.
   20 For what credit is_it, if sinning and being_beaten you_all_will_be_enduring it.
   But if doing_good and suffering you_all_will_be_enduring it, this is a_favour before god.
   21 For you_all_were_called to this, because chosen_one/messiah also suffered for you_all, leaving an_example to_you_all, in_order_that you_all_may_follow_after after_the steps of_him, 22 who neither did sin, nor was_ deceit _found in the mouth of_him, 23 who being_insulted, was_ not _retaliating, suffering, was_ not _threatening, but was_giving_over him to_the one judging justly, 24 who himself offered_up the sins of_us in the body of_him on the cross, in_order_that having_died to_sins, we_may_live to_righteousness, of_whose by_his wounds you_all_were_healed.
   25 For you_all_were like sheep being_strayed, but you_all_were_returned now to the shepherd and overseer of_the souls of_you_all.
  Pe-1 3  Likewise, women, being_subjected to_your own husbands, in_order_that even if any are_disbelieving in_the word, they_will_be_being_won by the conduct of_their wives apart_from word, 2 having_observed the pure conduct in respect of_you_all.
   3 Of_whom it_let_be not the person outwardly of_braid of_hairs and of_putting_about of_gold or adorning of_dresses of_clothes, 4 but the hidden person of_the heart, in the indestructible beauty of_the gentle and quiet spirit, which is precious before god.
   5 For thus once also the holy women hoping in god were_adorning themselves, being_subjected to_their own husbands, 6 as G‹H‹Sarra/(Sārāh)›H›G submitted to_G‹H‹Abra'am/('Avərāhām)›H›G: calling him master, of_whom you_all_were_become children, doing_good and not fearing not_one fear.
   7 men, likewise dwelling_with them according_to knowledge, as with_a_weaker vessel with_the feminine, rendering_out honor as also to_fellow-heirs of_the_grace of_life, in_order that the prayers of_you_all to_ not _be_being_hindered.
   8 And the end, all being, like_minded, sympathetic, brother-loving, tender-hearted, humble, 9 not giving_back evil for evil, or insult for insult, but instead blessing, that to this you_all_were_called, in_order_that you_all_may_inherit blessing.
   10 For the one wanting life to_be_loving, and to_see good days, let_ his tongue _cease from evil, and his_lips not to_speak deceit.
   11 And let_him_turn_away from evil, and let_him_do good, let_him_seek peace and let_him_pursue it.
   12 Because the_eyes of_the_master are on the_righteous, and the_ears of_him toward the_petition of_them, but the_face of_the_master is against those_doing evil.
   13 And who is the one going_to_mistreat you_all, if you_all_may_become zealous for_the good.
   14 But if even might_be_suffering because_of righteousness, you_are blessed.
   And the fear of_them, neither be_afraid nor you_all_may_be_disturbed, 15 But as_master the chosen_one/messiah sanctify in the hearts of_you_all, always be ready for a_defense to_everyone requesting you_all an_account, concerning the hope in you_all, 16 but with gentleness and respect, having a_ good _conscience, in_order_that in which they_are_slandering of_you_all as evildoers, the ones mistreating of_you_all may_be_disgraced the good conduct in chosen_one.
   17 For it_is better to_be_suffering doing_good, if the will of_god might_be_willing it, than doing_evil.
   18 Because also chosen_one died_off once for the_sins for of_us the_righteous for the_unrighteous, in_order_that he_may_bringing_forward you_all to_god, on_one_hand having_been_put_to_death in_the_flesh, on_the_other_hand having_been_given_life in_the_spirit, 19 in which also having_been_gone to_the to_spirits in prison he_proclaimed, 20 to_having_disbelieved ones once when the patience of_god was_eagerly_waiting in the_days of_G‹H‹Nōe/(Noḩa)›H›G, the_ark being_prepared in which a_few, this is, eight souls, were_brought_safely_through through the_water.
   21 Which also representative now the_immersion is_saving you_all, not a_removal of_the_filth of_flesh, but of_a_ good _conscience, the_inquiry toward god through the_resurrection of_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one, 22 having_been_gone into heaven who is at the_right hand of_god, with_angels, and authorities, and powers having_been_subjected to_him.
  Pe-1 4  Therefore chosen_one having_suffered in_the_flesh, also you_all arm the same intention, because the one having_suffered in_the_flesh has_ceased from_sin, 2 in_order that to_live the remaining time in the_flesh no_longer to_lusts of_the_people, but to_the_will of_god.
   3 For the having_passed_by time is sufficient to_have_produced the counsel of_the pagans, having_pursued in wantonness, lusts, drunkenness, carousing, drinking_parties, and unlawful idolatries.
   4 With which they_are_being_surprised, not running_together of_you_all into the same of_intemperance pouring_out, slandering, 5 who will_be_giving_back an_account to_the one ready to_judge the_living and the_dead.
   6 For to this end was_gospel_preached even to_the_dead, in_order_that they_may_be_judged on_one_hand according_to humans in_the_flesh, on_the_other_hand may_be_living according_to god in_the_spirit.
   7 And the end of_all has_neared.
   Therefore be_sensible and be_sober for the_prayers, 8 before all things, having the earnest love among yourselves, because love is_covering a_multitude of_sins, 9 be hospitable to one_another apart_from grumbling, 10 each one as he_received a_gift, serving it to yourselves, as good managers of_the_various grace of_god.
   11 If anyone is_speaking, as oracles of_god, if anyone is_serving, as of strength of_which god is_supplying, in_order_that in all things god may_be_being_glorified through G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one/messiah, to_whom is the glory and the power to the ages of_the ages.
   Truly.
   12 Beloved, be_ not _being_surprised at_the fiery_trial among you_all for trial to_you_all becoming, as_though of_a_stranger happening to_you_all, 13 but as you_all_are_sharing in_the sufferings of_the chosen_one, be_rejoicing in_order_that you_all_may_be_elated also exulting in the revelation of_the glory of_him.
   14 You_are blessed if you_all_are_being_derided in the_name of_chosen_one, because the the spirit of_the of_glory and of_god, is_resting on you_all.
   15 For not let_ anyone _be_suffering of_you_all as a_murderer, or a_thief, or an_evildoer, or as a_meddler.
   16 But if as a_follower_of_the_messiah, not let_him_be_being_ashamed, but let_him_be_glorifying god in this name.
   17 Because the time it_is to_begin the judgment from the house of_god, and if first from us, what will_be the outcome of_the ones disbelieving in_the gospel of_god.
   18 And if the righteous is_being_saved with_difficulty, where will_be_appearing the ungodly and sinner.
   19 So_then also the ones suffering according_to the will of_god, let_them_be_entrusting the souls of_them to_a_faithful creator in welldoing.
  Pe-1 5  Therefore I_am_exhorting elders among you_all, a_fellow-elder and witness of_the sufferings of_the chosen_one, also the partner of_the glory going to_be_being_revealed, 2 shepherd the flock of_god among you_all, not compulsory, but willingly, according_to god, not greedily, but eagerly, 3 not as exercising_mastership over_the_lots, but becoming examples to_the flock.
   4 And the chief_shepherd having_been_revealed, you_all_will_be_receiving_back the unfading crown of_glory.
   5 Likewise, younger ones, be_subjected to_your_elders.
   And, all tie_in humility to_one_another because, god is_opposing against_the_proud, but is_giving grace to_the_humble ones.
   6 Therefore be_humbled under the mighty hand of_god, in_order_that he_may_exalt you_all in time, 7 having_throw_on all the worry of_you_all on him, because with_him is_caring about you_all.
   8 Be_sober, watch.
   The opponent of_you_all, the_devil, is_walking as a_lion roaring, seeking to_swallow_up, 9 against_whom resist, solid in_the in_faith, having_known the same things of_the sufferings, by_the in the world of_you_all brotherhood you_all_are_experiencing.
   10 And the god of_all grace, the one having_called you_all to the eternal glory of_him in chosen_one/messiah, you_having_suffered little, he will_be_preparing you, will_be_strengthening you, will_be_strengthening you, 11 to_him be the dominion for the ages.
   Of_the ages.
   Truly.
   12 By G‹Silouanos›G, I_wrote to_you_all of_the faithful brother (as I_am_reckoning), through short words, exhorting and testifying this to_be the_true grace of_god, in which you_all_stood.
   13 Is_greeting you_all the in G‹H‹Babulōn/(Bāvel?)›H›G chosen_together, and Rx-G‹Markos›G-Rx, the son of_me.
   14 Greet one_another with a_kiss of_love.
   Peace be to_you_all all, who are in chosen_one.

2 G‹Petros›G

1  Rx-G‹Simōn›G-Rx G‹Petros›G, a_slave and ambassador of_G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, to_the ones equal_valued with_us having_obtained a_faith in the_righteousness of_the god of_us and Rx-saviour-Rx, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one: 2 grace to_you_all and might_have_multiplied peace in the_knowledge of_god, and of_G‹H‹Yēsous the master of_us.
   3 As having_granted all things to_us of_the_divine power of_him, the things to life and devoutness, through the knowledge of_the one having_called us, to_his_own glory and virtue, 4 through which has_granted his precious and greatest promises to_us, in_order_that through these things you_all_may_become partners of_the_divine nature, having_escaped_from from_the corruption in the the_world by lust.
   5 Also same thing and this earnestness all they_having_brought_in, supply in faith of_you_all virtue, and in virtue knowledge, 6 and in knowledge self-control, and in self-control endurance, and in endurance devoutness, 7 and in devoutness brotherly_love, and in brotherly_love love.
   8 For these things being and abounding in_you_all, is_appointing neither idle nor unfruitful, for the knowledge of_the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one.
   9 For in_whomever these things is_ not _being_present, is blind, being_near_sighted, having_received forgetfulness of_the purification the long_ago of_him sins.
   10 Therefore brothers rather, be_earnest, to_be_making the calling and choice of_you_all confirmed, for practicing these things by_no_means you_all_may_ not _stumble once.
   11 For thus the entrance into the eternal kingdom of_the master of_us and Rx-saviour-Rx, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one will_be_being_ richly _supplied to_you_all.
   12 Therefore I_will_be_going always to_be_reminding you_all concerning these things, although having_perceived them and having_been_strengthened in the being_present truth.
   13 And I_am_considering it right for as_long_as I_am in this tent, to_be_awaking you_all by the_remembrance, 14 having_known that the removal of_the tent of_me is imminent, as also the master of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, made_evident to_me.
   15 And I_will_be_being_earnest also each_time to_be_having you_all to_be_making a_remembrance of_these things after my departure, .
   16 For we_made_known to_you_all the power and coming of_the master of_us G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah not having_followed_after having_been_cleverly_devised myths, but having_been_become eyewitnesses of_the greatness of_that one.
   17 For having_received honor and glory from god the_father, a_voice such_as_this having_been_brought to_him by the majestic glory: this is the son of_me, the beloved in whom I took_pleasure, 18 and we heard this voice from heaven, having_been_brought with him, being on the holy mountain.
   19 And we_are_having the prophetic word more_confirmed, to_which you_all_are_doing well taking_heed, as to_a_lamp shining in a_dark place, until of_which day may_shining_through, and the_morning_star may_rise in the hearts of_you_all.
   20 Knowing this first, that any prophecy of_scripture of_its_own interpretation is_ not _becoming.
   21 For was_ not once _brought by_the_will of_a_human prophecy, but people being_carried by the_ holy _spirit, spoke the_holy from of_god.
  Pe-2 2  But false_prophets also became among the people, as also among you_all will_be false_teachers, who will_be_sneaking_in sects of_destruction, even disowning the master having_bought them, bringing_upon ˱upon˲_themselves quick destruction.
   2 And many will_be_following_after of_them in_the wantonnesses, because_of whom the way of_the truth will_be_being_slandered.
   3 And in greediness they_will_be_merchandising you_all with_fabricated words, for_whom the judgment anciently is_ not _idling, and the destruction of_them is_ not _nodding_off.
   4 For if god not spared of_the_angels having_sinned, but having_committed_to_the_underworld them to_pits of_darkness, gave_over them for judgment being_kept, 5 and he_ not _spared from_the_ancient world, but preserved the_eighth, G‹H‹Nōe/(Noḩa)›H›G, a_proclaimer of_righteousness, having_brought_ the_flood _upon ˱upon˲_the_world of_the_ungodly, 6 and having_reduced_to_ashes the_cities of_G‹H‹Sodoma/(Şədom)›H›G and G‹H‹Gomorra/('Amorāh)›H›G condemned them, having_presented an_example of_going to_be_acting_ungodly 7 and rescued righteous Rx-G‹H‹Lōt/(Lōţ)›H›G-Rx, being_distressed by the of_conduct of_the lawless in wantonness 8 (for the righteous man dwelling among them in_seeing and in_hearing, day by day, was_tormenting in_his_ righteous _soul with_their_lawless works), 9 the_master has_known to_be_rescuing the_devout ones out_of temptation, but to_be_keeping the_unrighteous ones to being_punished the_day of_judgment, 10 and most_of_all the ones pursuing after the_flesh in the_lusts of_defilement, and despising of_mastership.
   Darers self-willed, they_are_ not _trembling slandering at_glories, 11 where angels being greater in_strength and power, are_ not _bringing a_slanderous judgment against them before the_master.
   12 But these like illogical animals, having_been_born natural for capture and corruption, slandering in what things they_are_not_knowing, in the corruption of_them and they_will_be_being_corrupted, 13 being_done_wrong as_the_wage of_unrighteousness, as_gratification considering the luxury in the_day, stains and blemishes reveling in the seductions of_them, feasting_with with_you_all, 14 having eyes full of_adulteress, and unceasing from_sin, enticing unstable souls, having a_heart having_been_trained in_greediness, children of_a_curse, 15 leaving the_straight way, they_were_strayed having_followed_after in_the way of_G‹H‹Bala'am/(Bilə'ām)›H›G of_G‹H‹Bosor/(Bə'ōr)›H›G, loved the_wage of_unrighteousness, 16 but he_had a_rebuke for_his_own lawlessness, a_ silent _donkey having_spoken in of_a_human a_voice, forbade the insanity of_the prophet.
   17 These are waterless springs, and mists being_driven by storm, for_whom darkness of_darkness has_been_kept.
   18 For speaking arrogant words of_uselessness, they_are_enticing with the_lusts of_the_flesh to_wantonness, the ones barely escaping_from the ones being_conducted in deception, 19 promising freedom to_them, they being to_slaves of_corruption, for by_what anyone has_been_overcome, by_this one he_has_been_enslaved.
   20 For if having_escaped_from the defilements of_the world, in the_knowledge of_the master and Rx-saviour-Rx of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, and having_ again _been_entangled in_these things they_have_been_overcome, the last has_become to_them worse than the first.
   21 For it_was better, for_them, not to_have_known the way of_righteousness, than having_known it, to_turn_away from the holy commandment having_been_given_over to_them.
   22 the word of_the true proverb has_happened to_them: a_dog having_returned to its own vomit, and: a_sow having_washed, to wallowing in_the_mud.
  Pe-2 3  Beloved this is now, the_second letter I_am_writing to_you_all, in which I_am_awaking the sincere mind of_you_all in remembrance, 2 to_be_reminded of_the words having_been_previously_spoken, by the holy prophets, and of_the commandment of_the master and Rx-saviour-Rx of_the ambassadors of_you_all.
   3 Knowing this first, that mockers will_be_coming in the_last of_the days with mocking, pursuing according_to their own lusts of_them, 4 and saying: Where is the promise of_the coming of_him.
   From for that time the fathers were_fallen_asleep, all things is_continuing thus from the_beginning of_creation.
   5 For this is_escaping_notice them willing, that the_heavens were anciently, and the_earth of_having_consisted out_of water and through water by_the word of_god, 6 through which the then world perished having_been_flooded with_water.
   7 But the now heavens and the earth, by_the same word are having_been_stored_up, for_fire being_kept to the_day of_judgment and destruction of_ungodly people.
   8 But let_ this _be_escaping_notice one not you_all, beloved, that one day with the_master is like a_thousand years and a_thousand, years are like one day.
   9 the_master is_ not _slowing of_his promise, as some are_considering slowness, but he_is_being_patient toward you_all, not wishing any to_perish, but all to to_accept repentance.
   10 But the_day of_the_master will_be_coming like a_thief, in which the heavens will_be_passing_away vociferously, and elements being_burned will_be_being_destroyed, and the_earth and the works in it will_be_being_found.
   11 all these things thus being_destroyed, what_kind_of people it_is_fitting you_all to_be_being in holy conduct and devoutness, 12 expecting and hurrying the coming of_the day of_god, because_of which the_heavens being_burned, will_be_being_destroyed, and the_elements being_burned, is_being_melted.
   13 But we_are_waiting for_new heavens and an_empty earth, according_to the promise of_him, in which righteousness is_dwelling.
   14 Therefore, beloved, expecting these things, be_earnest spotless and blameless to_be_found by_him in peace.
   15 And be_considering the patience of_the master of_us, salvation, as also beloved of_us brother G‹Paulos›G, according_to the wisdom having_been_given to_him, wrote to_you_all, 16 as also in all letters, speaking in them concerning these things, among which is hard_to_understand things some, which the ignorant and unstable are_twisting as also the other scriptures, to their own destruction of_them.
   17 Therefore you_all, beloved, knowing_before be_guarding, in_order_that you_all_may_ not _fall_from from_your own steadfastness having_been_carried_away with_the deception of_the lawless.
   18 But be_growing in grace, and in_the_knowledge of_the master and Rx-saviour-Rx of_us, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah.
   To_him be the glory both now and to the_day of_eternity.
   Truly.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50

The source table used to create this file is Copyright © 2022 by https://GreekCNTR.org

USFM file edited 2022-09-24 17:40 by ScriptedBibleEditor v0.14

1 G‹Yōannēs›G

1  What was from the_beginning, what we_have_heard, what we_have_seen with_the eyes of_us, what we_saw, and the hands of_us touched, concerning the word of_life, 2 and the life was_revealed, and we_have_seen, and we_are_testifying, and we_are_reporting to_you_all, the life eternal, which was with the father, and was_revealed to_us, 3 what we_have_seen, and we_have_heard, we_are_reporting also to_you_all, in_order_that also you_all fellowship may_be_having with us, also and fellowship our is with the father, and with the son of_him, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah.
   4 And these things are_writing we, in_order_that the joy of_us may_be having_been_fulfilled.
   5 And is this the message which we_have_heard from him and we_are_declaring to_you_all, that god light is, and darkness in him, not is not_one.
   6 If we_may_say that fellowship we_are_having with him, and_yet in the darkness we_may_be_walking, we_are_lying and not we_are_practicing the truth.
   7 But if in the light we_may_be_walking, as he is in the light, fellowship we_are_having with one_another, and the blood of_G‹H‹Yēsous the son of_him, is_cleansing us from all sin.
   8 If we_may_say that sin not we_are_having, ourselves we_are_deceiving and the truth not is in us.
   9 If we_may_be_confessing the sins of_us, faithful he_is and righteous, in_order_that he_may_forgive to_us our sins, and may_cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
   10 If we_may_say that not we_have_sinned, a_liar we_are_making him, and the word of_him not is in us.
  Jn-1 2  Little_children of_me, these things I_am_writing to_you_all, in_order_that not you_may_sin.
   And if anyone may_sin, an_advocate we_are_having with the father, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one the_righteous, 2 and he the_atonement is for the sins of_us, not for and our sins only, but also for all the world.
   3 And by this we_are_knowing that we_have_known him, if the commandments of_him we_may_be_keeping.
   4 The one saying, I_have_known him, and the commandments of_him not keeping, a_liar is, and in this one the truth not is, 5 but whoever may_be_keeping of_him the word, truly in this one the love of_god has_been_perfected.
   By this we_are_knowing that in him we_are: 6 the one saying in him to_be_remaining, ought as that one walked, also himself to_be_walking.
   7 Beloved, not a_commandment new I_am_writing to_you_all, but a_commandment old, which you_all_were_having from the_beginning.
   The commandment old is the word that you_all_heard.
   8 Again a_commandment new I_am_writing to_you_all, which is true in him and in you_all, because the darkness is_being_passed_away, and the light true already is_shining.
   9 The one saying in the light to_be, and the brother of_him hating, in the darkness is until now.
   10 The one loving the brother of_him, in the light is_remaining, and offense not is.
   in him.
   11 But the one hating the brother of_him, in the darkness is, and in the darkness is_walking, and not has_known where he_is_going, because the darkness blinded the eyes of_him.
   12 I_am_writing to_you_all, little_children, because have_been_forgiven to_you_all your sins, because_of the name of_him.
   13 I_am_writing to_you_all, fathers, because you_all_have_known the one from the_beginning.
   I_am_writing to_you_all, young_men, because you_all_have_overcome the evil one.
   14 I_wrote to_you_all, little_children, because you_all_have_known the father.
   I_wrote to_you_all, fathers, because you_all_have_known the one from the_beginning.
   I_wrote to_you_all, young_men, because strong ones you_all_are, and the word of_god in you_all is_remaining, and you_all_have_overcome the evil one.
   15 Neither be_loving the world, nor the things in the world.
   If anyone may_be_loving the world, not is the love of_the father in him.
   16 Because all which is in the world, the desire of_the flesh, and the desire of_the eyes, and the arrogance of_the living, not is from the father, but from the world is.
   17 And the world is_being_passed_away, and the desire of_it, but the one doing the will of_god, is_remaining for the age.
   18 Little_children, the_last hour it_is, and as you_all_heard that the_false_messiah is_coming, even now false_messiahs many have_become, whence we_are_knowing that the_last hour it_is.
   19 From us they_came_out, but not they_were of us, for if of us they_were, they_had_remained would with us, but in_order_that they_may_be_revealed that not they_are all of us.
   20 And you_all the_anointing are_having from the holy Rx-one-Rx, and you_all_have_known all.
   21 Not I_wrote to_you_all because not you_all_have_known the truth, but because you_all_have_known it, and because any falsehood of the truth not is.
   22 Who is the liar, except the one disowning that G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G not is the chosen_one/messiah.
   This one is the false_messiah, the one disowning the father and the son.
   23 Everyone disowning the son, neither the father is_having.
   The one confessing the son, also the father is_having.
   24 You_all what you_all_heard from the_beginning, in you_all it _let_be_remaining.
   If in you_all it_may_remain what from the_beginning you_all_heard, also you_all in the son and in the father will_be_remaining.
   25 And this is the promise which he promised to_us, life eternal.
   26 These things I_wrote to_you_all concerning the ones misleading you_all.
   27 And you_all, the anointing that you_all_received from him, is_remaining in you_all, and not need you_all_are_having that anyone may_be_teaching you_all, but as the of_him anointing is_teaching you_all concerning all things, and true is and not is a_falsehood, and as it_taught you_all, you_all_are_remaining in him.
   28 And now, little_children, be_remaining in him, in_order_that if he_may_be_revealed, we_may_have boldness, and not we_may_be_ashamed because_of him at the coming of_him.
   29 If you_all_may_have_known that righteous he_is, you_all_are_knowing that also everyone practicing righteousness of him has_been_born.
  Jn-1 3  See what_kind_of love has_given to_us the father, in_order_that children of_god we_may_be_called, and we_are.
   Because_of this, the world not is_knowing us, because not it_knew him.
   2 Beloved, now children of_god we_are, and not_yet was_revealed what we_will_be.
   We_have_known that if he_may_be_revealed, similar to_him we_will_be, because we_will_be_seeing him as he_is.
   3 And everyone having hope this in him, is_purifying himself, as that one pure is.
   4 Everyone practicing sin, also lawlessness is_practicing, and sin is lawlessness.
   5 And you_all_have_known that that one was_revealed, in_order_that sins he_may_take_away, and sin in him not is.
   6 Everyone in him remaining not is_sinning, everyone sinning neither has_seen him, nor has_known him.
   7 Little_children, no_one let_be_deceiving you_all, the one practicing righteousness, righteous is, as that one righteous is.
   8 The one practicing sin, of the devil is, because from the_beginning the devil is_sinning.
   For this was_revealed the son of_god, in_order_that he_may_destroy the works of_the devil.
   9 Everyone having_been_born of god, sin not is_practicing, because the_seed of_him in him is_remaining, and not he_is_able to_be_sinning, because of god he_has_been_born.
   10 In this manifest is the children of_god, and the children of_the devil: everyone not practicing righteousness, not is of god, and the one not loving the brother of_him.
   11 Because this is the message that you_all_heard from the_beginning, that we_may_be_loving one_another, 12 not as Rx-G‹H‹Kain/(Qayin)›H›G-Rx of the evil one was, and slayed the brother of_him.
   And for_reason_of what he_slayed him.
   Because the works of_him evil was, but the ones of_the brother of_him, righteous.
   13 Not be_Rx-marvelling-Rx, brothers, if is_hating you_all the world.
   14 We have_known that we_have_departed from death to life, because we_are_loving our brothers.
   The one not loving, is_remaining in death.
   15 Everyone hating the brother of_him, a_murderer is, and you_all_have_known that any murderer not is_having life eternal in himself remaining.
   16 By this we_have_known love, because that one for us the life of_him laid, and we ought for our brothers, our lives to_lay.
   17 But whoever may_be_having the living of_the world, and may_be_observing the brother of_him need having, and may_shut the heart of_him from him, how the love of_god is_remaining in him.
   18 Little_children, not we_may_be_loving in_word, nor in_the tongue, but in work and in_truth.
   19 by this we_will_be_knowing that of the truth we_are, and before him we_will_be_persuading the hearts of_us, 20 that if may_be_condemning of_us the heart, that greater than is god the heart of_us, and he_is_knowing all things.
   21 Beloved, if our heart not may_be_condemning, confidence we_are_having toward god, 22 and whatever we_may_be_requesting, we_are_receiving from him, because the commandments of_him we_are_keeping, and the pleasing things before him we_are_practicing.
   23 And this is the commandment of_him, that we_may_be_believe in_the name of_the son of_him, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, and we_may_be_loving one_another, as he_gave the_commandment to_us.
   24 And the one keeping the commandments of_him, in him is_remaining, and he in him.
   And by this we_are_knowing that he_is_remaining in us, by the spirit whom to_us he_gave.
  Jn-1 4  Beloved, not in_every spirit be_believing, but be_approving the spirits, whether of god it_is, because many false_prophets have_come_out into the world.
   2 By this you_all_are_knowing the spirit of_god: every spirit that is_confessing G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one in the_flesh having_come, of god is, 3 and every spirit that not is_confessing G‹H‹Yēsous, of god not is.
   And this is the spirit of_the false_messiah, which you_all_have_heard that it_is_coming, and now in the world is already.
   4 You_all of god are, little_children, and you_all_have_overcome them, because greater is the one in you_all, than the one in the world.
   5 They of the world are, because_of this from the world they_are_speaking, and the world from_them is_hearing.
   6 We of god are.
   The one knowing god, is_hearing from_us, whoever not is of god, not is_hearing from_us.
   By this we_are_knowing the spirit of_truth and the spirit of_deception.
   7 Beloved, we_may_be_loving one_another, because love from god is, and everyone loving, from god has_been_born, and is_knowing god.
   8 The one not loving, not knew god, because god love is.
   9 In this was_revealed the love of_god among us, that the son of_him, the only_begotten, has_sent_out god into the world, in_order_that we_may_live through him.
   10 In this is love, not that we have_loved god, but that he loved us, and sent_out the son of_him, a_atonement for the sins of_us.
   11 Beloved, if thus god loved us, also we ought one_another to_be_loving.
   12 god no_one ever has_seen, if we_may_be_loving one_another, god in us is_remaining, and the love of_him having_been_perfected in us is.
   13 By this we_are_knowing, that in him we_are_remaining, and he in us, because from the spirit of_him he_has_given to_us.
   14 And we have_seen and are_testifying that the father has_sent_out the son, Rx-saviour-Rx of_the world.
   15 Whoever may_confess that G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G is the son of_god, god in him is_remaining, and he in god.
   16 And we have_known and have_believed the love that is_having god in us.
   god love is, and the one remaining in love, in god is_remaining, and god in him is_remaining.
   17 In this has_been_perfected love with us, in_order_that confidence we_may_be_having in the day of_judgment, because as that one is, also we are in world this.
   18 Fear not is in love, but the perfect love out is_throwing fear, because the fear punishment is_having, and the one fearing, not has_been_perfected in love.
   19 We are_loving, because he first loved us.
   20 If anyone may_say, I_am_loving god, and the brother of_him may_be_hating, a_liar is, for the one not loving the brother of_him, whom he_has_seen, god, whom not he_has_seen, not is_able to_be_loving.
   21 And this commandment we_are_having from him, that the one loving god, may_be_loving also the brother of_him.
  Jn-1 5  Everyone believing that G‹H‹Yēsous is the chosen_one/messiah, of god has_been_born, and everyone loving the one having_bore him, is_loving also the one having_been_born from him.
   2 By this we_are_knowing that we_are_loving the children of_god: whenever god we_are_loving, and the commandments of_him we_may_be_keeping.
   3 For this is the love of_god, that the commandments of_him we_may_be_keeping, and the commandments of_him heavy not are, 4 because everyone having_been_born of god, is_overcoming the world.
   And this is the victory having_overcame the world, the faith of_us.
   5 Who and is the one overcoming the world, except the one believing that G‹H‹Yēsous is the son of_god.
   6 This is the one having_come by water and blood, and spirit, G‹H‹Yēsous chosen_one, not by water only, but by water and by blood.
   And the spirit is testifying, because the spirit is the truth.
   7 Because three are the ones testifying: 8 the spirit, and the water, and the blood, and the three in one there_are.
   9 If the testimony of_humans we_are_receiving, the testimony of_god greater is, because this is the testimony of_god, that he_has_testified concerning the son of_him.
   10 The one believing in the son of_god, is_having the testimony in himself, the one not believing in_god, a_liar has_made him, because not he_has_believed in the testimony that has_testified god concerning the son of_him.
   11 And this is the testimony: that life eternal gave to_us god, and this life in the son of_him is.
   12 The one having the son, is_having life, the one not having the son of_god, life not is_having.
   13 These things I_wrote to_you_all, in_order_that you_all_may_have_known that life you_all_are_having eternal, to_the ones believing in the name of_the son of_god.
   14 and this is the confidence that we_are_having toward him: that if anything we_may_be_requesting according_to the will of_him, he_is_hearing from_us.
   15 whatever we_may_be_requesting, we_have_known that we_are_having the requests that we_have_requested from him.
   16 If anyone may_see the brother of_him sinning a_sin not to death, he_will_be_requesting and he_will_be_giving to_him life, to_the ones sinning not to death.
   ˱There˲_is a_sin to death, not concerning that sin I_am_saying that he_may_ask.
   17 All unrighteousness sin is, and there_is a_sin not to death.
   18 We_have_known that everyone having_been_born of god not is_sinning, but the one having_been_born of god is_keeping him and the evil one not is_touching against_him.
   19 We_have_known that of god we_are, and the world whole in the evil one is_lying.
   20 And we_have_known that the son of_god is_coming, and has_given to_us a_mind, in_order_that we_are_knowing the true Rx-one-Rx, and we_are in the true Rx-one-Rx, in the son of_him, G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah.
   This one is the true god and life eternal.
   21 Little_children, keep yourselves from idols.

2 G‹Yōannēs›G

1  The elder, to_the_chosen mistress and the children of_her, whom I am_loving in truth (and not I only, but also all the ones having_known the truth), 2 because_of the truth remaining in us, and with us will_be to the age: 3 will_be with us grace, mercy, peace, from god the_father and from G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah, the son of_the father, in truth and love.
   4 I_was_elated exceedingly that I_have_found some of the children of_you walking in truth, as the_commandment we_received from the father.
   5 And now I_am_asking you, mistress, not as a_commandment new writing to_you, but what we_were_having from the_beginning, that we_may_be_loving one_another.
   6 And this is love: that we_may_be_walking according_to the commandments of_him.
   This the commandment is, as you_all_heard from the_beginning, that in same you_all_may_be_walking.
   7 Because many deceivers came_out into the world, the ones not confessing G‹H‹Yēsous/(Yəhōshū'a)›H›G chosen_one/messiah coming in flesh.
   This one is the deceiver and the false_messiah.
   8 Be_seeing yourselves that not you_all_may_lose what things you_did, but a_reward full you_all_may_take_back.
   9 Everyone going_beyond and not remaining in the teaching of_the chosen_one/messiah, god not is_having, the one remaining in the teaching, this one both the father and the son is_having.
   10 If anyone is_coming to you_all, and this teaching not is_bringing, not be_receiving him into your_house, and to_be_rejoicing to_him not be_saying, 11 the one for saying to_him to_be_rejoicing is_sharing in_the works of_him evil.
   12 Many things having to_you_all to_be_writing, not I_was_counseled through paper and ink, but I_am_hoping to_become to you_all, and mouth to mouth to_speak, in_order_that the joy of_you_all having_been_fulfilled may_be.
   13 Is_greeting you the children of_the sister of_you chosen.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50

3 G‹Yōannēs›G

1  The elder, to_G‹Gaios›G the beloved, whom I am_loving in truth.
   2 Beloved, concerning all things I_am_hoping you to_be_being_prospered and to_be_being_healthy, as the soul of_you is_being_prospered.
   3 For I_was_ exceedingly _elated the_brothers coming and testifying of_you in_the truth, as you are_walking in the_truth.
   4 I_am_ not _having joy greater than these things, that I_may_be_hearing my children walking in the truth.
   5 Beloved, you_are_doing faithful whatever, you_may_do for the brothers and this is for_strangers, 6 who testified before the_assembly to_the love of_you, whom you_will_be_doing well, having_sent_forward worthily of_god.
   7 For they_came_out for the name, receiving nothing from the pagans.
   8 Therefore we ought to_be_supporting such men, in_order_that we_may_be_becoming fellow-workers with_the truth.
   9 I_wrote something to_the assembly, but the one loving_to_be_first of_them, G‹Diotrefēs›G, is_ not _accepting us.
   10 Because_of this, if I_may_come, I_will_be_reminding the works of_him, which he_is_doing, rambling_against us with_ evil _words, and not being_sufficed with these things, nor himself is_accepting the brothers, but he_is_forbidding the ones wishing, and is_throwing_ them _out from the assembly.
   11 Beloved, be_imitating not evil, but good.
   The one doing_good is of god, the one doing_evil has_ not _seen god.
   12 To_G‹Dēmētrios›G has_been_attested by all, and by the truth itself, and we also are_testifying, and you_have_known that the testimony of_us is true.
   13 I_was_having many things to_write to_you, but I_am_ not _wanting to_be_writing to_you through ink and pen, 14 but I_am_hoping to_see you immediately, and we_will_be_speaking mouth before mouth.
   15 Peace be to_you.
   The friends are_greeting you.
   Be_greeting the friends by name.
  

USFM file created 2022-09-24 17:36 by extractVLT v0.50
